280059142145309.description:
With the album ”Electric” Amund Maarud (30) is kind of back where he started deeply into the blues tradition. The album marks Amund´s 20 years as a blues musician with release as early as the age of 10! However for those who think this is a regular blues release, do think again. There are a variety of styles on this album, and people in guitar rock tradition will probably note this as a rock release.

Amund Maarud first started in the band Maarudkara at the age of 6 with his brother Henrik on drums and his father on bass. They came second on the yearly talent competition on NRK in 1997 and released the first album ”First Blues” the year after. Later he had his youth playing in the houseband at the Oslo´s legendary blues club Muddy Waters.

”Some choices you just make without considering options. When I was 10 I just decided to become a bluesguitarist fulltime. It didn´ seem any more strange to me than the wish to become a fireman” says Amund Maarud

In the year 2000 he started Amund Maarud Band, still with his brother Henrik on drums and with straight blues on the repertoire. The band was nominated for a Norwegian Grammy at Spellemannprisen 2003 for the debut album ”Ripped, Stripped & Southern Fried”, and received good acclaim for the follow up album ”Commotion”.
The band was one of the most sought after on the Norwegian live blues scene, but the ”young hope” of blues wanted to experiment more with rock musicand in 2006 they started The Grand.

They started their own record company and released both an EP and album in 2007. They were nominated to the Alarm‐award for best live band the same year. 

The Grand held a number of concerts both in Norway and abroad and was noted at festivals such as Øya festival, Roskilde, Eurosonic and even ”Rockpalast” on German TV.
280059142145309.name: AMUND MAARUD | THE ISLINGTON | LONDON

289330154554897.description:
“The best bands bend.  They adjust and they sway.  They can drift towards or they can attack the sound that flows for them.  But they always move.”  

We Have Band return this year with their third album MOVEMENTS - 11 songs conceived in their East London basement studio.  Produced by band member Tom Wegg-Prosser with additional glitter added by Tim Goldsworthy.  It's music from the sweaty hearts of husband and wife Tom and Dede and band mate Darren Bancroft.  

WHB toured their previous releases intensely, but now it's about taking it back to the dance floor - the place that inspired them to make music together in the first place. 

There was a simple rule when writing songs for this album: if they didn't make the band move at first conception, then they didn't make the cut.  The result is an A list of deadly, ruthless and energetic cuts - all refined, polished and turned to gold by the magical hands of Tim Goldsworthy. 

MOVEMENTS celebrates the sacred union of beat and lyric. When Darren sings on You Only "Your movements stayed with me all day long, your mind was always on mine” it is the Moog line working with the vocal melody that stays with you. Dede’s assertion on Burning On My Lips that, “Standing in the line, first to lose my mind, don’t tell me that it’s wrong, this is where I belong” is delivered with a conviction that the kick drum stamps out with every pulse.  It's that repetitious, powerful mantra that makes MOVEMENTS a record impossible not to feel, impossible not to move to. The record that the band always set out to make.

http://www.wehaveband.com/

Tickets: http://bit.ly/TcyTxd
289330154554897.name: WE HAVE BAND (London/ Manchester)

Ali and Basti Schwarz - brothers and music lovers, created Tiefschwarz out of a passion garnered since 1990 from their first experiences as DJs at the now legendary clubs that Ali ran in Stuttgart "ON -U" (1990 - 1993) and "Red Dog" (1993 - 1997). These experiences and their obsession with the music they were hearing from within and across the German border, encouraged them to make the step from DJ to producer.

In 1996 Tiefschwarz was created and they began working together with acclaimed producer Peter Hoff in Stuttgart. After a few remixes, their first single "Music" was released in 1998 on Benztown and "Wave Music" NY. The success of the single motivated Tiefschwarz to record their debut album "Ral 9005" which came out on Four Music in 2000. "Ral 9005" was then seized upon by Derrick Carter & Luke Solomon for their Classic Recordings label in the UK in 2002. The album and the subsequent 4 singles (Thru a Little Window, Hello Again, Never, Nix) were received enthusiastically by both the English and international press, not to mention a growing fan base of music aficionados.

In 2002 Classic also released Ali & Basti's mix album "A Little Help For Your Friends" and their DJing career reached new heights with tours in Australia, the USA as well as gigs as far afield as Brazil and Russia

2003 saw the brothers up sticks and move to the creative capital of Berlin where they set up a new studio along with new producer & friend, Jochen Schmalbach. Continuing their burgeoning career as remixers (with previous greats such as their reworks of Masters at Work, Ultra Naté, Boogie Solitaire, Freaks, Isolee, Groove Armada) Ali and Basti went on to remix the likes of The Rapture, Cassius, Spektrum, Micatone, Lost & Alive, Lopazz, Osunlade, Minimal Compact, Trüby Trio, DJ Hell, Kelis, and Missy Elliott.

Their last single on Classic; "Nix" was the grand finale to a very special relationship and from there they joined and helped create 'Fine Records' in London (a division of Four Music, their former label in Germany). The first single was 'Ghost Track' accompanied by a Black Strobe remix followed by their fantastic 'Misch Masch' album which not only showcased their talent as DJs but also their remixing prowess on a double CD release.

The majority of 2004 and 2005 was spent juggling a high profile DJing career, whilst writing and producing their second and long awaited album 'Eat Books'. The first single from the album 'Isst was released in 2005 and was voted one of the best singles of the year by Trax and DJ magazine. After that came 'Wait and See' with vocals by Chikinki, Morning Siren' with vocals by Matt B.Safer from the Rapture followed by 'Fly' with a Steve Bug remix and then 'Damage' with Tracey Thorn and accompanied by a brilliant Mandy remix.

2006 was a big year for remixes, amongst other things. Three high profile mixes of Depeche Mode 'John The Revelator', Madonna's 'Get Together', Roxy Music's 'Rain Rain Rain' and Booka Shade's 'Darko'. Additionally, they released 2 mix albums - one for the outstanding Fabric series and the other in conjunction with the Time Warp festival in Germany.

2006 was also the year that Tiefschwarz began their own label - SOUVENIR. The project that Ali & Basti had excitedly planned for years with old friend Arthur Velasquez, finally came to fruition. The first release of course was a Tiefschwarz track called 'Hey', under a different moniker of 'Ichundu' which prompted fellow DJs and the press to conclude that Tiefschwarz were once again at the top of their league. The label has also carved itself a definitive position in the dance record industry of today by offering a continuous release of stand out tracks from artists such as Phonique, Riton, Tom Mangan, Ziggy Kinder, Ruede Hagelstein and The Psychonauts. 

2007 2008 2009
besides traveling the world as djs again tiefschwarz moved the studio and took philipp maier aka sante´on board as their new studio and label partner.. 
so the story continues ;-)

299501753532028.description:
Family Fodder was originally formed in 1979 by Alig Pearce - with a cast of thousands over three decades. They emerged from the melting-pot of 70s/80s London alongside This Heat, The Flying Lizards, The Pop Group, Slits and many others. The original formula consisted of psychedelic and new wave influences, incisive song-writing, improvisation, experiment and far-out dub mixing. They always managed to evade major exposure, but influenced generations of bands on five continents. Family Fodder was often more at home in the studio than on-stage, but completed several European tours as well as cherished performances in their native London.

The group released a series of compelling, now collectable singles and albums between 1979 and 1983. Described as "entertaining idiosyncratic experimentalism with pop sensibilities", they were best known for indie-chart hits such as "Debbie Harry", "Playing Golf (With My Flesh Crawling)" and "Savoir Faire". More recently, Family Fodder songs have been covered by Zion Train and Unrest, and they've been hailed as "unsung heroes" in The Wire.

Family Fodder also appear on the infamous Nurse With Wound list. "Their music was generally playful, a hint of dub and reggae mixed with absurd, blissful pop, with synthpunk and sometimes experimental instrumentation. Most of the lyrics were also sung in French, courtesy of original vocalist Dominique Levillain, a combination rumored to be of some significant influence over Stereolab." (Systems of Romance)

346717448800867.description:
Man erwarte bitte keine Witze, aber wenn man so will sind sie die Monty Python des Post-Punk. Auf ihren ersten vier Alben warf die 1978 gegründete Band The Monochrome Set auf beispiellose Art Dandyismus, Psychedelia, Rock’n’Roll, Kunststudentenunfug, Surf und britische Exzentrik zusammen – und erfand so ganz nebenbei den Indie-Pop. The Monochrome Set waren mithin mindestens so wichtig wie ihre Kollegen von Orange Juice. Allerdings weiß das kaum jemand. Kaum jemand außer dem Sänger Morrissey und dem Gitarrist Johnny Marr, die sich Gerüchten zufolge zum Zeitpunkt der Gründung ihrer Band The Smiths gerade über eine Monochrome-Set-Platte beugten. Oder John Peel, der die Band verehrte. Oder Vampire Weekend. Oder Django Django. Oder Belle & Sebastian. Oder Franz Ferdinand, die gleich weite Teile der Klangästhetik ihrer Helden übernahmen. The Monochrome Set sind insofern so etwas wie der Prototyp einer stilprägenden Band, der in ihrer Glanzphase – hier: der Post-Punk-Ära – wenig Erfolg beschieden war, aber zahllose Bandgründungen zu verantworten hat.
Seit ihrer Wiedervereinigung veröffentlichte die Band um Sänger Bid und Gitarrist Lester Square, der hauptberuflich als Kunstlehrer an einer Londoner Mädchenschule wirkt, zwei neue Alben, die nahtlos an die distinguierten und bisweilen bizarren Schrammel-Werke ihrer Frühphase anknüpfen. Im King Georg ist die legendäre Band bereits zum dritten Mal zu bewundern.

Datum: MI. 19.03.2014
Einlass: 20.00 Uhr
Beginn: 21.00
Abendkasse: 13 EUR

VVK unter:

Friday 25/04/14
10pm – 6am
Fire
South Lambeth Road,

Hosted by
SP:MC, Linguistics, AD, Mantmast.

Following 2 years of hosting some of the biggest warehouse parties London has seen, Shogun Audio return to the capital this April for one mega showcase at Fire*. Riding high off the label’s success in 2013, and picking up speed for the monumental 10 years of Shogun festivities, the night will flaunt an extensive range of talent the label has harnessed.

For the next Shogun London, Friction & Co. have called on an elite group of artists that are at the forefront of the UK bass music movement. Drawing on Calyx & Teebee’s no-nonsense approach to filling dancefloors, and Radio 1 resident Rockwell’s outside of the box track selection to get things started. Adding to that Rinse FM’s bass music tastemaker Icicle, plus two of drum n bass’s favourite duos in the form of Spectrasoul and Technimatic to get those tickets flying out the door. Also stepping up will be leaders of the new school Stray and Sam Binga. 

New Shogun recruit Joe Ford has been soaring through the ranks with his blend of the heavy and melodic, he’ll be playing b2b with Fourward. Not forgetting the debut performance from Neuropol, who’s EP for the label will be revealed soon. Bringing some of that vintage appeal will be Randall with one of his legendary jungle sets, that’ll leave you reminiscing of back in the day.

Of course no Shogun night would be complete without the legendary 2 hour throwdowns from label boss Friction guaranteed to destroy the dance and take no prisoners on the way. With all the usual suspects on the mic, you can guarantee SP:MC, AD, Mantmast and Linguistics will get you hyped up in typical Shogun style. 

*
"Regrettably and due to circumstances out of both Shogun Audio and LWE's control, we have been forced to change the venue of our next London show in April to Fire. No stranger to hosting some of the best underground events in the city, Fire will make the perfect host for a night that will showcase the best in bass music. Nothing else has changed - expect cutting edge drum n bass from Shogun artists and special guests, plus LWE will be working their magic on the venue and beefing up the Funktion 1 sound system to give it that extra punch. Tickets already purchased for the event at Pulse will still be valid at Fire.”


Advanced Tickets: £10 - £25 + bf

361668660643514.description:
Yes Sir Boss!!!
with support from Solko

Early bird tickets are SOLD OUT. Standard tickets are available here - http://bit.ly/1e3BCr4
or you can buy from the Jazz Cafe direct - http://bit.ly/LS9rOP

In 2004 Matt Sellors (lead singer) started a 3-piece blues outfit named Sellors and the Scientists. All students of Dartington College of Arts they gained notoriety as an original and exciting new live act. Members came and went but the core stayed the same and after graduating the band moved to Bristol. It was only then that Yes Sir Boss was really born. YSB soon began to make its mark as one of Bristol's best live bands and signed to Joss Stones' label Stone'd Records in 2010. Armed with their début album Desperation State they sailed onto the festival circuit and began what was to become a long and wonderful journey into the fields and clubs of the UK and beyond.

Over 300 gigs later, Yes Sir Boss continues to cultivate truly original and inspiring music, captivating audiences with their energy at many of the UK and Europe's best festivals. Summer 2013 saw the departure of long standing guitarist Luke Potter and a period of transition as the band evolved their sound and worked on new material. Now reformed and revitalised as a 5 piece, Yes Sir Boss have a 2nd album ready to record that moves away from their Ska infused past and explores the more blues/rock element of their sound.

With one album out (Desperation State, 2012) Yes Sir Boss aim to impress their fans for a second time with their new album due for release Spring / Summer 2014. Further touring is planned for Germany, The Netherlands, France, Austria and Switzerland and Scandinavia. Their ambition grows daily and they remain one of the UK's most exciting new bands. They are a must see for anyone with a love of music and an appreciation for what it is to be a band.

https://www.facebook.com/yessirboss
http://www.yessirboss.com/


Support from Solko
Solko are a 7 piece band with brass, bass, guitars, percussion blending an eclectic mix of reggae/dub rhythms with soulful vocals and melodic jazz horns.

2013 saw the band appear at festivals such as Secret Garden Party, Kendal Calling, Beat Herder and were deemed one of the 'Hidden Gems'
of the Soundwave festival in Croatia. Solko went on to completely sell out prestigious venue Norwich Arts Centre to top off a big summer. The band are currently recording a new record which is due for release in April/May 2014 with an accompanied UK tour.

"Bringing the values of classic dub production into a rockier frame of mind, this brass-bedecked 7-piece from Suffolk pack a mighty dance floor punch by way of crafty arrangements and show-off guitar."

www.soundcloud.com/solkomusic
www.facebook.com/solkomusic
www.solko.co.uk

364832673654683.description:
Canada's Biggest Paint Company is coming to London!

Campstock Presents...

Pa!nt !nfused @ London Concert Theatre (Cowboys)

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 

Headlining DJ ---> Keys N Krates

https://soundcloud.com/keysnkrates
https://twitter.com/keysnkrates

Keys N Krates formed as the brainchild of drummer Adam Tune, synth/keyboard aficionado David Matisse and internationally award-winning turntablist Jr. Flo. The Toronto trio came together in 2008 with the desire to bring their blend of live electronic instrumentation to the stage.

They've often been referred to as the worlds only "trap band," a title they reluctantly accept. Tune says it best: "At the end of the day, people are going to call us whatever they want. We are referencing everything from classic house music to Timbaland in our beats, but I think the trap references tap into what the current sound is, and we are okay with that."

Having toured their unique blend of hip hop and bass music extensively across North America, Keys N Krates put out a slew of original music in 2013. Their most recent body of work, titled SOLOW EP, was released via Steve Aoki's Dim Mak Records in September 2013.

The EP features KNK's banger "Treat Me Right," which launched with the support of figureheads like Diplo, Major Lazer, Flosstradamus, and TNGHT. It went to number one on Hype Machine, continues to chart on the Beatport Hip Hop Chart, and remains a fixture in DJ sets and car stereos across the globe.

Premiered by Annie Mac on BBC Radio1, their second single off SOLOW EP, "Dum Dee Dum," experienced a similar kind of success on the charts and has solidified the trio as creators of anthemic party music with a quickly growing fan base.

KNK has since explored their love for rap music by creating a remix of "Dum Dee Dum." Featuring G.O.O.D. Music's Cyhi The Prynce, King Louie, and Tree, the track has received glowing reviews from the likes of Fader Magazine, Vice Mag, and NahRight. "We had so much fun doing that rap remix," says Flo. "We can't wait to work with more rappers and vocalists in general."

Perhaps what truly separates Keys N Krates from the mass of Electronic and Hip Hop producers out there is the unique show they create by performing their bassy beats as a band, completely live. When you go to a KNK show, you will see their music and the music of others morphed and turned on it's head using only drums, keys, turntables and live sampling. This unique style creates not only a crazy dance party, but an experience and vibe like no other.

As a result, KNK have found themselves playing some of the world's largest Festivals, including Lollapalooza, Electric Zoo, Ultra Music Festival, Osheaga, and Sonar Festival (to name a few.) As Matisse says, "Our favourite thing is playing live and bringing people into our world."

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

As well, our great friends from TEAMLTD will be giving you the chance at scoring some of their awesome gear.

And of course, there will be some awesome drink specials throughout the night!

384831911653474.description:
LOVEiT holt mal wieder ein feines Häppchen House nach Stuttgart und präsentiert am 29. März Produzentin und DJ Lakuti in der Bar Romantica.

Lerato Khati aka. Lakuti stieg aus den Ruinen der Post-Apartheid in Südafrika auf. Sie wuchs in dem verarmten Soweto in Johannesburg auf und interessierte sich schon in jungen Jahren für Musik, die Soul und Funk Platten ihrer Mutter oder die Jazz-Platten ihres Großvaters. Am meisten wurde sie jedoch von den Chicago-House Vinyls beeinflusst, die irgendwie ihren Weg in die Townships fanden. 
Anfang der 90iger stampfte sie ihren ersten, kleinen Club namens Panet Hendon aus dem Boden und brachte internationale DJs nach Johannesburg, erste Veröffentlichungen auf dem südafrikanischen Deep House Label Syndicate folgten. 
Allmählich war Lakuti mit der geographischen Isolation unzufrieden und zog erst drei Jahre nach Toronto und schließlich nach London.  Dort promotete sie gemeinsam mit Earl Gateshead ihre Party im Club Plastic People. Lakutis Partyreihe hatte schon Gäste wie Juan Atkins, Move D, Rick Wade, Pantha Du Prince, Shed  oder Tama Sumo. Mit letzterer spielt sie übrigens im Februar 2014 in der Panorama Bar.
2007 gründete Lakuti die Agentur The Uzuri Artist Bookings & Management Agency und repräsentiert Künstler wie Levon Vincent, Fred P, Big Strick, Portable/Bodycode oder Chicago Skyway. Sie spielte bereits in Clubs wie Fabric (London), Panorama Bar (Berlin) und Rex Club (Paris). Gemeinsam mit Portable und Tama Sumo hat sie jüngst das Süd Electronic Imprint wieder aufleben lassen. 

+ Special Guest:
Für den Support haben wir noch einen Freund der Familie und Saufkumpane am Start. Christan Nikolaus, 23 Jahre alt, 6. Semester Kommunikationsdesign an der Akademie der bildenden Künste Stuttgart, in der Fachklasse Corperate Design. Er legt nebenher regelmäßig auf Aka Partys auf, hin und wieder in den Waggons und kleineren privaten Veranstaltungen. In jungen Jahren spielte er ausschließlich Hip Hop und zum House kam er durch alte Funk und Disco platten seines Onkels.

www.residentadvisor.net/dj/lakuti
www.lloveit.com

Vor Mitternacht 6€, danach 8€

Zdravíme všechny fanoušky kvalitní elektronické hudby. Máme zde další pokračování klubové techno akce My name is techno, která se uskuteční 11.4. 2014 v klubu Pekelnej Bar na pražském Andělu.

A bude se opravdu na co těšit. Po parádním dílu s Alexanderem Kowalskim, se můžete těšit na další   techno legendu, která na tomto večírku vystoupí.

 Tentokrát k nám z Londýna přiletí velká osobnost na poli 
elektronické scény, britská techno legenda, majitel labelu STIMULUS a TACTICAL, polovina dua KILLA PRODUCTIONS,  maestro PAUL MAC. 

Je nám obrovskou ctí  vůbec poprvé v Praze představit tuto legendu z britských ostrovů, špičkového producenta, který se na poli elektronické scény pohybuje už 25 let, vydal neuvěřitelných 140 releasů na více jak 50 labelech, jmenujme např. Kanzleramt, Theory, Ingoma, Blueprint a velká spousta  dalších.

Paul Mac je součástí energického projektu KILLA PRODUCTIONS, kterou tvoří s další legendou britské scény Benem Simsem! Jejich společná vystoupení sklízejí obrovský úspěch po celém světě a ne jinak tomu bylo i u nás na brněnské Apokalypse.

Paul Mac je geniální skladatel ve všech směrech, jeho producentská činnost je naprosto nevídaná a jeho obrovský hudební rozhled a počet vydaných releasů jsou toho jasným důkazem.

My se na jeho vystoupení moc těšíme a troufáme si tvrdit, že to bude opět originální a nezapomenutelný mejdan.

O support se postarají naši čeští borci. Vynikající techno producent MAKAROV,  dj B.ONE .K, PINY a LAMY CZ & SHIMITA.
A i tentokrát po skončení tohoto mejdánku, pro vás bude nachystána afterparty opět ve výběhu pražského ZOO baru! 

Kde budeme pokračovat našláplým line-upem a tančit do 
odpoledních hodin.

Samozřejmostí bude posílený zvuk, dekorace, videoprojekce a spousta dalších věcí. Pořádně pro vás peklíčko vymazlíme.

techno connection

Elgin is known the world over as a hard hitting wrestler who has had some of the toughest and grittiest matches in recent independent wrestling history. His strong work ethic and take-no-prisoners style in the ring has turned a lot of heads and this approach bleeds into his training regimen.

This course will be as tough and rewarding as any Star Power have hosted but if take this course head on then at the end you too will be able to call yourself "Unbreakable".

His wealth of knowledge and experience make Elgin a perfect fit for Star Power Training and unmissable opportunity for anyone looking to start or further their wrestling training.

419757388161212.description:
ATTENTION ALL BURNERS HAPi Experience Needs 
Your SUPPORT 

HAPi Experience is an interactive art installation touring three different Burner events in 2014.
We will be taking our travelling HAPi Experience to Midburn in Israel, Nowhere Festival in Spain and Burning man festival in the USA.
We need your help to raise £14,000 for the building and manufacturing of our amazing sustainable bespoke Lotus Flower Structure. So that we can embark on the magical mystery burner tour and bring the HAPi Experience to you all merging our dreams with yours.

OUR MISSION
Our mission is to bring use Healing Art and Performance fused into very unique installation to transform daily lives. The multi-sensory experience is contained in a glowing lotus flower structure, to encourage participants to cultivate positive changes within the world.

THE FUNDRAISER
This event is our first fundraiser and is for the first stage of funding for the manufacturing of the lotus structure and the first steps on the way to our goal. And is set to give London a taste of the wonders of the HAPi Experience project.
On 19th April 2014 at the venue: SHAPES in Hackney for a unique all sensory experience...from 10pm-6am. 
We are hosting a Costume Party in an Enchanted forest.
Our theme is Little Red Riding Hood versus the Big Bad Wolf so pick your team and your Costume wisely!

Line-up:
On the Little Red Riding Hood TEAM:

CALEMMA (UNDER TRIBES) (Deep/Minimal/Experimental Techno)
HUNTER SEEKER (USA) (Cross Genre Electronica) A$IA (Deep Tech House)
KRIZPO (Deep Bass/Techno)
MAUOQ (D n B/Dub Step/ Half Step)
JU JU ROCK (Live) (African Rock) ANTONIA PAGANO (VJ)

On the Big Bad Wolf TEAM:
INNER EFFECT (World influenced sounds/Mid Tempo Bass & Beats/Gypsy swing) MICHELLE CADE (Dub)
SYSTEM 2 (Progressive Breaks and Psychedelic Tech Funk)
LADY AVERY (Ska/Reggae)
BAHAR (Progressive Psy-trance with funky attributes) LUCIO LUONGO (VJ)

Our sonic melting pot of  dub, reggae, ska, breaks, drum and bass, Balkan beats, dub step,psy trance and special live bands The UTURNS and JUJU ROCK will be accompanied by enchanting visuals against the backdrop of our magical forest by awesomely talented VJ's Antonio Pagano and Lucio Luongo. 

Come leave the dark reality of London behind and enter the HAPi experience for a night of mayhem and wonder that will leave you enchanted for days.


BUY TICKETS:

http://hapiexperiencefundraiser.brownpapertickets.com

SPECIAL EARLY BIRD TICKETS:£10

ADVANCE TICKETS:£12

AT DOOR:14

(COME IN COSTUME £13)

419933701474880.description:
A cura di Marco Gobetti 

A Torino, su strada (lungo Po, parco Michelotti) e nella Libreria L'ibrida Bottega (Via Felice Romani 0/a): ingresso libero per il pubblico

Da martedì 8 a sabato 12 aprile 2014, tutti i giorni dalle 20.30 alle 23.00; con restituzione pubblica finale dalle h 21 di sabato.

Informazioni:  tel. 3394801713 / 011.19871905 - Numero massimo partecipanti: 12

E' possibile aderire facendone richiesta scritta entro il  25 marzo 2014 all'indirizzo e-mail: azionateempatieurbane@gmail.com
Contributo di partecipazione pro capite: euro 80

Per partecipare è necessario un interesse reale verso la proposta (da motivare nella richiesta scritta); utile - ma non indispensabile - una precedente esperienza teatrale (di qualunque genere e durata).

Ogni partecipante è invitato a leggere e conoscere l'opera "Martin Eden" di Jack London .

Lo stage “MARTIN EDEN DI JACK LONDON”, assume la modalità d’azione dello stage per attori di creazione pubblica “Verranno giorni che non basterà guardare” (da tempo sperimentato dalla Compagnia Marco Gobetti: http://goo.gl/tjAJli) di cui costituisce sviluppo e applicazione alla Letteratura; intende risolversi in una spettacolarità pubblica tratta dall'opera "Martin Eden" di Jack London: uno spettacolo corale realizzato da un gruppo di cittadini, che, nella provvisorietà di più incontri pubblici tentano di dare vita e corpo alla Letteratura.
Si lavora sull'opera Martin Eden di Jack London, traendone monologhi, narrazioni e dialoghi, che possano essere armonicamente associati, fino a costituire un unico corpus in vista della restituzione finale.
Lo stage avviene sia in luogo chiuso, ma aperto al pubblico in ogni fase del lavoro, sia andando a toccare piazze, vie o altri luoghi pubblici della città o del paese in cui avviene.
I partecipanti agiscono dunque, in parte in uno spazio a loro dedicato e, in parte, direttamente di fronte al pubblico estemporaneo degli spazi cittadini, che vengono così a fruire e ad essere “abitati” da questo laboratorio.
Attraverso la valorizzazione dell’avventura e della provvisorietà, si sperimenta un teatro che ha come primo scopo quello di cercare un pubblico per tentare di accadere, divenendo. Dunque si offre pure ai cittadini una spettacolarità inconsueta, quella fatta da persone che accettano il rischio di fallire creando pubblicamente.

Dalla scheda di “Verranno giorni che non basterà guardare” (http://goo.gl/tjAJli):

Le basi

Sono convinto che contino le azioni. E che solo se un'azione nasce da un'urgenza può sortire un effetto. Che preparare un'azione non significa prevedere ciò che faremo, bensì abbandonarsi a ciò che ci accadrà, per tentare di fare accadere qualcosa. Che ci si può allenare all'abbandono. Che occorre avere il coraggio di confondersi, di sperimentare avventura. Che un teatro possibile è quello di cittadini fra cittadini. Che proprio la creazione deve nutrirsi di provvisorietà. Che scegliendo con sana incoscienza spazi, modi e tempi apparentemente inopportuni, gli artisti si affrancano da quello status civitatis che li fa cittadini maldestri fra un pubblico di uomini declassati e votati al silenzio: gli artisti si possono fare artigiani di incontri. L'incontro è tanto più vero quanto più la sua provvisorietà è condivisa con il pubblico: si può provare a fare un teatro che nasca proprio dagli incontri, anziché pretendersi compiuto per affrontare incontri. Si può sperimentare un teatro che abbia il coraggio di mostrarsi "brutto", perché sta tentando di avvenire. Si può, non "si deve". La certezza di essere nel giusto è la nemica peggiore dell'avventura. 

Un teatro fatto con i gesti e con le parole incerte di chi abita uno spazio a lui nuovo, ma non essendo da solo ha bisogno di cercare mezzi utili a comunicare. 

Un teatro che ha come primo scopo quello di cercare un pubblico per tentare di accadere, divenendo.

Lo stage

Propongo un lavoro pubblico con un gruppo di attori, che siano disposti ad assumersi il rischio più alto, quello di fallire creando pubblicamente: che accettino di operare in condizioni di paura e di difficoltà. Davanti a testimoni sempre nuovi, ad un pubblico cercato e trovato che, oltre che raggiungere gli attori, sia raggiunto dagli attori. 

Il lavoro si svolge per metà in un teatro o sala e per metà fuori, con incursioni in diversi luoghi della città (su strada e non solo).
Agli spettatori così incontrati, non vengono proposti spettacoli pronti: con il pubblico si scende a patti, si chiede attenzione, si racconta e si mostra quello che sta avvenendo, con la coscienza che da una curiosità reciproca può nascere lo stupore.

Si sperimenta un teatro che non ha fretta di trovare armonie, che rifugge i virtuosismi e la forma fine a se stessa. Un teatro che inizia inchiodando il corpo dell'attore alla gestualità deviata di chi ha semplicemente dei fogli in mano e deve guardarli senza dimenticare che più avanti, oltre a quei fogli, ci sono altri corpi e altri occhi. Un teatro di chi con quei fogli in mano non si limita a leggere, ma vive dialogando, raccontando e agendo in uno spazio condiviso con un pubblico.

Base degli attori è quindi il teatro (o sala), dove affinano la drammaturgia, ri-scrivono e interpretano il copione, sperimentano il racconto a soggetto per sintesi e ritorno, organizzano le spedizioni, riprovano a recitare quanto già sperimentato all’esterno e accolgono chi entra: il teatro è sempre aperto al pubblico.

Quale conclusione, sperimentazione e concretizzazione del metodo acquisito, alla sera dell’ultimo giorno i partecipanti restituiscono pubblicamente il risultato del lavoro svolto.


Suggestioni per i partecipanti

Alcuni pensieri di Gian Renzo Morteo:

"…Il sociale è il rapporto vivo, bidirezionale scena-platea e viceversa.
Quindi: avvenimento, imprevisto, improvvisazione, continua evoluzione dello spettacolo.
Non soltanto rappresentazione: favola, modo di essere…" 

"Essere ascoltati: una conquista, non un presupposto, tanto meno un diritto"

”L’imitazione, la vera imitazione, non è copia, è trasformazione, trasfigurazione, rielaborazione fantastica”.
        
”Se togliamo tutto ciò che si può togliere a uno spettacolo teatrale, constatiamo che due sono gli elementi indispensabili affinché il teatro resti teatro: l’attore e il pubblico” 


Fonti per la drammaturgia

Oltre all'indispensabile lettura del romanzo, utile per i partecipanti la pagina dedicata a Martin Eden su wikipedia.org: http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Eden


_________________


Marco Gobetti  - Attore, regista e drammaturgo attivo dagli anni ‘90, coniuga da sempre l'attività di prosa su strada a quella nei teatri. A partire dal 2000 inventa il Teatro Stabile di Strada® e fonda la Compagnia Marco Gobetti, per cui scrive e realizza, fra tutti, gli spettacoli: "Voglio un pappagallo - Matthew Smith: il p(r)ezzo della vita di un uomo", "IN-EC-CESSO - Una bomba per cintura", "Lo stagno", "La memoria non è mai cimitero - I meccanismi della Shoah nella storia dell'uomo", "Cristo muore in fabbrica: è solo un altro incidente", “L’anciové sota sal”, "Bestiame etimologico" "La tragedia della libertà", "La legge"; oltre ad eventi e progetti quali "I Santi sulla strada",  "Dove sono nato non lo so - Una settimana di lettura accampata tra i filari in occasione del centesimo anniversario della nascita di Cesare Pavese", "La vera storia di Hilario Halubras", “METAMORFOSI SU STRADA – Lugano, 3 settembre 2011”, "Lezioni recitate", “IL COMICO E LA VITA - Da un saggio del filosofo Carlo Sini nasce una creazione pubblica”, “IL PENSIERO POLITICO: LETTURE INTEGRALI IN VETRINA – Prima e seconda puntata: LA CONQUISTA DEL PANE di Pëtr Alekseevic Kropotkin e COMPENDIO DEL CAPITALE di Carlo Cafiero”. Nel luglio 2012 avvia lo stage per attori di creazione pubblica “Verranno giorni che non basterà guardare”.
In teatro è diretto, fra gli altri, da Leo Muscato in "Io e Matteo", "Terra dei Miracoli" e "Romeo & Giulietta - Nati sotto contraria stella"; nel cinema da Giuliano Montaldo ("I Demoni di San Pietroburgo") e in radio da Sergio Ferrentino ("Le madri atroci", "Le parole dell'odio", "Radio Bellablu") e Alberto Gozzi ("Fuga dal Natale").  


_______________________________________



Associazione Culturale
COMPAGNIA MARCO GOBETTI
Via Monteu da Po 9
10132 Torino
matricola ENPALS: 209236001
posizione INAIL: 18251694
matricola INPS: 8139283664
Presidente e legale rappresentante: Marco Gobetti


La Compagnia nasce nel gennaio 2008 per iniziativa di Marco Gobetti, con l'intento sviluppare e condividere con altri artisti suggestioni, poetica e azione derivanti dal lavoro del decennio precedente: dalla drammaturgia agli allestimenti con la Compagnia Il Barrito degli Angeli, dal teatro di strada sui lungomare toscani al progetto Stanza Teatrale presso il CSA Askatasuna, dai laboratori presso le ASL all’invenzione del TEATRO STABILE DI STRADA®. All'atto della fondazione, la Compagnia Marco Gobetti assume il repertorio degli spettacoli già scritti e realizzati da Marco Gobetti con la compagnia Il Barrito degli Angeli.
La Compagnia si caratterizza come luogo di scambio ed incontro fra artisti diversi per percorsi ed esperienze: un gruppo eterogeneo, variabile e modulabile a seconda dei progetti intrapresi.  

Spettacoli

Voglio un pappagallo – Matthew Smith: il p(r)ezzo della vita di un uomo (2006)
Una rocambolesca corsa fra tinte gialle rosa e noir, una tragicomica lotta contro ogni tempo e ogni spazio: Matthew Smith conoscerà se stesso solo alla fine, quando diventerà emblema e rivelazione di un esecrabile anonimato del dolore. 
IN-EC-ESSO – Una bomba per cintura (2007)
Un operaio il pomeriggio di un venerdì d’estate non uscì dalla fabbrica e si rintanò nel cesso. Lì trascorse il fine settimana, scrivendo per due giorni e tre notti su un computer palmare e facendo precise richieste: se queste non fossero state accettate entro le ore 6 del lunedì successivo, l'operaio si sarebbe fatto esplodere con il cesso, i muri e le macchine della fabbrica.
Questo è un fatto realmente accaduto, ma nessuno lo sa e nessuno lo saprà mai. Perché nessuno è autorizzato a crederci.

Lo stagno (2008 – riallestimento – Patrocinio della Città di Torino)
Un uomo e una donna.
Lui veste una divisa militare e ha un paio di scarponi ai piedi, lei ha i piedi scalzi e indossa un vestito a fiori.
Lui è tornato da una guerra. Lei no.
Lei vuole festeggiare il suo ritorno. Lui non vuole.
Lei vuole che lui ricordi di quando si volevano bene e di suo nonno e delle storie che raccontava e di tante altre cose, ma lui non vorrebbe: forse ricorderà. Lui tiene tanto ai suoi scarponi.
Lei vuole che lui riveda i propri genitori, lui non vorrebbe: forse li rivedrà. Lui tiene tanto ai suoi scarponi.
Lei canta e vuole che lui canti, lui non vorrebbe: forse canterà. Lui tiene tanto ai suoi scarponi.
Lei vuole che lui si tolga la divisa, lui non vorrebbe: forse la toglierà. Lui tiene tanto ai suoi scarponi.
Lei vuole che lui si tolga gli scarponi.
E glielo chiede tante volte.
Lui non vuole. E nega tante volte.
Lei insiste tante volte. Lui le chiede un bacio in cambio, tante volte.
E lei glielo nega, tante volte.
Ma che cosa c'è negli scarponi?

La memoria non è mai cimitero – I meccanismi della Shoah nella storia dell’uomo (2008)
Un attore e un musicista impegnati nell’analisi della Shoah del secolo scorso e delle shoah in atto o incombenti ai giorni nostri, alla luce delle infinite violenze mortali (di massa e non solo) che si sono ripetute nel corso della Storia.
Una sorta di spettacolo-concerto, volto a suscitare un interesse partecipe e stupito. Dalla fiaba occidentale più antica, alla strage dei Melii da parte degli Ateniesi, agli eccidi degli Indios testimoniati da Bartolomé de Las Casas, ai pensieri scritti da Hitler e spaventosamente analoghi a tanta comunicazione contemporanea; oltre che alle azioni compiute da Hitler e tremendamente simili a tante vicende contemporanee: ad unire il tutto una drammaturgia originale fatta di racconti, versi in libertà, musica, canto e di un’urgenza 
continuamente altalenante fra comprensione e comunicazione.

Cristo muore in fabbrica: è solo un altro incidente (2009 - con il sostegno del Sistema Teatro Torino e il Patrocinio della Città di Torino e della CGIL)
Cristo si reincarna in un ladro che, tornando dal mare alla guida di un’auto rubata, è vittima di un incidente; soccorso, ruba un’ambulanza e scappa. Vittima di un altro incidente - non riesce a centrare la porta di un casello -, viene estratto dal mezzo in fiamme. Stranamente il corpo non presenta ustioni, ma ha segni di frustate e una ferita nel costato. L’uomo chiede da bere e poi parla: “Adesso che sono tornato, mi reincarnerò in molti altri”. Detto questo, scompare. La notizia si diffonde e centinaia di persone si accalcano in caserme, ospedali e parrocchie, avanzando il sospetto di essere il Cristo. Il Vaticano prende cautamente posizione. La situazione precipita quando si scopre che il corpo di un operaio estratto da una fabbrica in fiamme, oltre che segni di frustate e una ferita nel costato, ha una corona di spine in testa... 

L’ANCIOVÉ SOTA SAL (2011 - prodotto con il sostegno di Regione Piemonte, Assessorato alla Cultura, Fondazione Teatro Ragazzi e Giovani Onlus e Istituto per i Beni Marionettistici e il Teatro Popolare)
Un uomo sogna una notte di essere un venditore di acciughe che finisce sotto sale fra le sue stesse acciughe, dentro al barile che le contiene. Questo è un sogno che lascerà il suo segno nella vita dell'uomo e in quella delle persone che incontrerà:
“A val nen tant ël seugn: / col seugn a l'é la spluva ch'a 'nvisca 'l feau. / A val còsa ch'a l'é capitàie dòp”
(Non vale tanto il sogno: / quel sogno è la scintilla che accende il fuoco. / Vale ciò che è capitato dopo)
Nell’"Anciové sota sal" si sperimenta un uso poetico e contemporaneo del dialetto piemontese, in un allestimento fondato sulla coesione fra componente attoriale, visiva e musicale. Lo spettacolo ha tre brevi intermezzi in italiano: una sorta di prologo in itinere che ogni volta riassume ciò che è avvenuto e anticipa ciò che avverrà, pure per facilitare la comprensione a chi non conoscesse il dialetto. 

LA METAMORFOSI DI KAFKA – Lettura integrale in concerto (2011 – in collaborazione con Realtà Debora Mancini) 
La paradossale e pure incredibilmente verosimile vicenda di Gregor Samsa, viene divisa in quattro parti: due attori e due attrici si avvicendano per leggere in quattro tempi “La metamorfosi” di Franz Kafka. Ogni parte del racconto vive di uno stile e di una lettura interpretativa differente, in quanto affidata ad artisti fra loro eterogenei per esperienza e formazione; l’esecuzione dal vivo di un musicista polistrumentista si interseca, al terna ed accompagna. Una girandola di sensibilità alla prova per sublimare in azione drammatica la commovente tragedia di un protagonista indimenticabile, che è fra le più alte incarnazioni della sensibilità moderna e contemporanea. 

Bestiame etimologico (2012 - co-produzione con l'Istituto per i Beni Marionettistici e il Teatro Popolare)
Bestiame etimologico si pone nella prospettiva di proiettarsi a ritroso nel tempo, per rintracciare il valore della parola quale atto di creazione.
A prendere corpo è una cosmogonia che nasce dalle parole, appunto, che si inanellano in forma di favola, segnando il destino dell'umanità. Una cosmogonia visionaria e imprevedibile, di disarmante semplicità quanto stupefacente. 

1863-1992 | DI GIOVANNI IN OLTRE – Storia d'Italia e di persone da Giovanni Corrao a Giovanni Falcone (2012)
L'incredibile storia di un uomo dell'Ottocento che si trasforma in un uccellino, per diventare un uomo del Novecento e oltre. 
La violenza usata con disinvoltura dai poteri forti dello Stato - quegli stessi che dovrebbero essere garanti di giustizia - segna il processo che porta all’unificazione formale dell’Italia, dando luogo a una inquietante deriva verso un sistema viziato e pericoloso: un’oligarchia che, sotto la maschera di un'apparente legalità, infetta tuttora i poteri dello Stato e agisce manipolando il diritto, per perseguire interessi di parte e per ridurre intere masse di cittadini all'ignavia culturale e politica.

Progetti

DOVE SONO NATO NON LO SO – Una settimana di lettura accampata tra i filari in occasione del centesimo anniversario della nascita di Cesare Pavese (2008, in collaborazione con la Fondazione Circuito Teatrale del Piemonte e il Patrocinio della casa editrice Einaudi). 
Tre attori si alternano alla lettura consecutiva dell’intera opera di Cesare Pavese, accampati in tenda per 
una settimana (9-16 settembre 2008) in cima a una collina del Roero, con le Langhe all’orizzonte. La loro voce, per quattordici ore al giorno (dalle ore 10 alle 24), complice una potentissima amplificazione innestata sui pali dei filari, risuona sin giù a valle e accoglie gli spettatori in arrivo: le parole di Cesare Pavese, parendo divenire emanazione delle vigne stesse, accompagnano il pubblico mentre sosta, mangia giù a valle, parte alla volta del bricco e sale arrancando sulla capezzagna fra le vigne, per raggiungere la fonte della spettacolarità. 
 
I Santi sulla strada (dicembre 2009) 
Evento itinerante in otto Comuni ad alta marginalità del Piemonte. Un attore percorre in macchina 1015 chilometri in tre giorni, fermandosi in undici Comuni del Piemonte. Davanti al Municipio di ogni Comune sosta per un'ora, leggendo in lingua originale brani dalla Legenda Aurea di Jacopo da Varagine (1228-1298) riguardanti la vita o la vicenda del Santo Patrono del luogo; immediatamente dopo la lettura racconta a soggetto in italiano quanto appena letto in latino. 

La vera storia di Hilario Halubras (2010) 
Progetto di produzione culturale che utilizza la drammaturgia e la recitazione su strada per arricchire l'immaginario collettivo con una figura viva, una maschera contemporanea (Hilario Halubras). Un tipo fisso che non smetterà mai di crescere e maturare in relazione alle realtà con cui verrà a contatto (mediatiche, linguistiche, economiche, sociali...), con l'unico vincolo della propria origine: la stessa precisa, immutabile vicenda che di volta in volta verrà resa nota.
 
METAMORFOSI SU STRADA – Lugano, 3 settembre 2011 (2011 - in collaborazione con il Dicastero Attività Culturali – Settore Spettacoli - Città di Lugano e la casa editrice Alla chiara fonte) 
Una giornata di lettura pubblica su strada in occasione del centesimo anniversario del soggiorno di Franz Kafka a Lugano. Costante dell’evento è la diffusione nell’aria delle parole dello scrittore, secondo una ciclicità predefinita che alterna artisti e avvicenda nuclei artistici in luoghi diversi della città.
Quattro attori, accompagnati da due musicisti interpretano consecutivamente le opere di Franz Kafka: gli artisti si alternano dal primo pomeriggio a sera fra Riva Caccia, fronte LAC (presso la stele in porfido) e piazza Cioccaro per leggere i romanzi "Il processo" e "Il Castello", il racconto "La metamorfosi" e un’antologia delle altre opere dello scrittore.
Un tempo, uno spazio e un’azione liberamente condivisibili per sublimare nella ricerca di incontro ed empatia fra artisti e cittadini, l’assurdità sapiente, la speranza disarmante e la profonda umanità dell’universo kafkiano.

Lezioni recitate (2011-2013, in collaborazione con il Centro studi Piero Gobetti e con il sostegno del Comitato Resistenza e Costituzione del Consiglio Regionale del Piemonte)
Un attore recita nelle scuole – e anche in circoli, biblioteche, librerie, centri di studio e di incontro – lezioni scritte dallo storico Leonardo Casalino (Universitè Stendhal Grenoble 3), alle quali dà corpo, voce e interpretazione:
- Vittorio Foa - Pensare il mondo con curiosità
- Leone Ginzburg - Costruire il futuro nel presente
- Emilio Lussu - Il romanzo inevitabile dell’antifascismo italiano
- Giaime e Luigi Pintor - Agire in modo utile
- Camilla Ravera – Uniformare la vita a una convinzione
- Umberto Terracini - La politica come partecipazione collettiva e difesa dell’autonomia individuale 

IL COMICO E LA VITA - Da un saggio del filosofo Carlo Sini nasce una creazione pubblica (2012 - co-produzione con Realtà Debora Mancini, in collaborazione con Comune di Cinisello Balsamo, con il sostegno di Fondazione Comunitaria NORD MILANO, CAF ACLI, Coop UniAbita, partner di progetto Comune di Solaro, Cinis Aeli Club)

IL PENSIERO POLITICO: LETTURE INTEGRALI IN VETRINA – Prima e seconda puntata: “LA CONQUISTA DEL PANE di Pëtr Alekseevic Kropotkin” e “COMPENDIO DEL CAPITALE di Carlo Cafiero” (2012, in collaborazione con Lunetta11)

Verranno giorni che non basterà guardare – stage per attori di creazione pubblica (2012) 
Un lavoro pubblico con un gruppo di attori, che siano disposti ad assumersi il rischio più alto, quello di fallire creando pubblicamente: che accettino di operare in condizioni di paura e di difficoltà. Davanti a 
testimoni sempre nuovi, ad un pubblico cercato e trovato che, oltre che raggiungere gli attori, sia raggiunto dagli attori.  

LA TRAGEDIA DELLA LIBERTA' tramite AZIONATE EMPATIE URBANE® (2013 – in collaborazione con Lunetta11) 
Di come lo Stato impose la chiusura delle scuole; e, per fare eseguire l’ordinanza, ufficiali dell’esercito furono nominati presidi; e in una scuola, nel giorno del commiato, accadde un imprevisto: di come, quando e perché quattro studenti, avendo sbranato un preside, cambiarono vita e nome. Ovvero: per la creazione di un nuovo mito. 
Azione pubblica che prepara la realizzazione dello spettacolo “La tragedia della libertà”

Poetica
 
Occorre generare miti immaginifici. Gettare semi di rivolte possibili. 
Il teatro non può limitarsi a relazionare, a documentare il reale, a dare informazioni utili o a tutelare memorie.
Il teatro è civile quando, astraendo dalla realtà senza prescinderne, tenta di costruire civiltà, quando bada ai cives, offrendo loro possibilità molteplici di sogni, pensieri e azioni: quando è energia che incontra energie, relazione che innesca relazioni. 
Il teatro può essere civile dunque per l’azione che lo muove (gli attori cittadini fra i cittadini, alla ricerca dei cittadini, i cives), ancora prima che per le tematiche che affronta: un pubblico da cercare, da raggiungere e da conquistare, non solo da aspettare. Per dirla con le parole di uno storico e teorico del teatro come Gian Renzo Morteo: “Essere ascoltati: una conquista, non un presupposto, tanto meno un diritto”. 
 
Dettagli di poetica, attività e percorsi:
 
www.compagniamarcogobetti.com
www.seunapecorabrucailsole.wordpress.com

424211464375414.description:
Georgie Loves Asad Rizvi with Twisted Mayhem to Host Room2
Saturday 5th April 2014 At the Barn 

Room1 (House / Tech-House) 
Special Guest Asad Rizvi (Reverberations London)
with support from :- Lawrence b2b Kelly wainwright // Mickey Forrester // Voodoo Junky // Tony Slackshot // Jon Sharpe


Room2 Hosted by Twisted Mayhem (EDM / Garage/ DnB) 
Scottish (Amplified)
Landslide (Stable Sounds)
Adicon (Dirty Dandy)

Asad Rizvi  - Biog

Frequently misspelled, Asad Rizvi is a name that House music lovers associate with consistency, refinement and diversity. With over 100,000 units sold of his work, Asad’s sprawling discography covers a multitude of dance music's most illustrious labels including Om, Global Underground, King Street, The End, Wall of Sound, Loveslap!, Tango, Urbantorque, Loaded, Visitor, as well as his own imprints Wrong and Reverberations. Having been dubbed a “new school hero” by Muzik magazine, “Producer for 2000” by Mixmag, and a “DJ for 2000” in The Face, “Best Compilation of 2003” in M8, his distinctive sound has continually been winning appraisal from the industry’s leading music publications and Dj’s alike. Over the years his work has won the avid support of jocks as diverse as: Danny Tenaglia, Laurent Garnier, Mark Farina, Terry Francis, Mr. C, DJ Heather, Tom Middleton, Doc Martin, Adam Freeland, Gilles Peterson, Inland Knights, Fred Everything, Danny Howells, Desyn Massiello and seemingly countless others.

Asad is not up there in the top 20 lists of the worlds' biggest DJs. He has nonetheless remained one of the busiest and most well-travelled London house jocks for many years. His infectious yet eclectic slant on House music has regularly proven to satisfy the most purist underground dance-floors to the most up-for-it big room crowds. Having graced the decks at hundreds of venues across five continents, he has made appearances at some of the world's most well respected venues including Fabric (London), Pacha (Buenos Aires), Stereo (Montreal), Folies Pigales (Paris), Roxy & Mecca (Prague), Crystal (Istanbul), The End (London), and playing to crowds of up to 20,000 people.

Having had an action-packed Summer touring far and wide from Mexico to Georgia with a string of sublime releases that have seen him moving back into more electronic house territories, Asad has been working overtime on new originals and remixes, a compilation, as well as travel plans to rock yet more dance-floors across the globe. An ever-ubiquitous presence in House music is here to stay and will indeed be a name you'll be hearing yet more of in 2011.


7pm - Late // Over 18 // R.O.A.R // £5 ADV // £6 OTD

Anselmo Ralph atingiu o número 1 no Top Álbuns e no Top Artistas do Music Box. Conquistou os lugares de pódio na Tabela do iTunes e no Top da RFM. Anselmo Ralph, o cantor angolano com maior sucesso na Europa. Chega a Londres em Abril   de 2014  para apresentar o seu novo álbum “A Dor do Cupido”.

Desde sempre ligado à música, Anselmo Ralph cedo apostou na sua carreira musical. Com milhares de CD's vendidos, estará em concerto no dia 26 de Abril  @ CORONET. Esta sera uma  oportunidade não só de conhecer o novo álbum de Anselmo Ralph, mas também de ouvir e dançar ao som dos sucessos "Curtição", "Está Difícil" ou "Não me Toca", entre muitos outros.
Anselmo Ralph no CORONET Londres: «A Dor do Cupido» cantada em coro por milhares no dia 26 de Abril de 2014.

Não há boca que não cante, não há rádio que não toque e não há português que não conheça Anselmo Ralph. A digressão de "A Dor do Cupido" deu os primeiros passos em Angola, mas soma e segue em Portuga e Inglaterra.

Anselmo Ralph conquistou o seu primeiro Disco de Ouro em Portugal, ultrapassando a marca dos 7.500 discos vendidos, que lhe foi entregue durante o espetáculo por Paulo Junqueiro, Diretor Geral da Sony Music Portugal.

"Estás no ponto", "Mente para mim" e "Única Mulher" são algumas das canções do novo trabalho, lançado em Portugal .

About the Headliners.......

X's April party brings the triple threat of Tiefschwarz, Locked Groove and Avatism to Egg for another night of House and Techno shenanigans.

Formed in '96, Stuttgart born sibling duo Tiefschwarz have been at the top of the game for years, thanks to their expert command of a whole range of styles.Countless tours around the world, several albums, an endless run of dancefloor hits, and remixes for the likes of Masters At Work, Cassius and Kelis have been highlights of a glittering career. Heads of Souvenir, their own label, the brothers have ensured the Tiefschwarz name is a byword for melody rich dance music.

Belgian producer Locked Groove's dexterous mesh of life affirming U.S. House and the blackened Industrial Funk of European Techno makes him the quintessential modern day producer. Releases on Scuba's Hotflush and Red D's We Play House have cemented his status as a genuine crossover threat, with only the man himself knowing which direction his music will take next.

A close associate of former X guests Clockwork, Italian producer Avatism has been turning heads around the world with his deep and mysterious musical creations. Bringing a bit of intrigue to the dancefloor he promises to play a captivating set when he turns out for us at Egg.
439683636162762.name: X presents: Tiefschwarz, Avatism & Locked Groove at Egg London

ADVANCE TICKETS FOR SAT APR 05  SOUTH LONDON SOUL TRAIN MARVIN GAYE 30TH ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL ARE SOLD OUT. HOWEVER WE HAVE A MINIMUM OF 500 TICKETS AVAILABLE ON THE DOOR, SO PLENTY OF ROOM FOR EVERYBODY TO COME AND GET DOWN! [Early Pls] See you on the dancefloors Fo Sho! Next Event Sat Apr 19, The South London Soul Train in 4 rooms over 3 floors w/ Jazzheadchronic, The Fontanelles Live, DJ Snowboy + More. http://www.residentadvisor.net/event.aspx?567541

Sat April 05 - The South London Soul Train marks the 30th anniversary of the passing of the genius that is / was Marvin Gaye. [April 01 1984] Your Host Jazzheadchronic taking you through a celebratory retrospective of classic Marvin. The Motown Years to epic works of the 70’s - From Iconic solo hits like ‘Heard It Through The Grapevine’ and ‘What’s Going On’ to modern classic ‘Sexual Healing' - Not to forget his little known work as Motown Drummer with the likes of Little Stevie, The Marvalettes + Martha and The Vandellas - as well as classic duets with the likes of Diana Ross and Tammi Terrell. "Can I get a Witness” to "Ain’t No Mountain High Enough”. Pure Marvin delivered loud large and direct to the dance floor on level 1 by the Jazzhead who’ll also be dropping a few non Marvin funk, soul and disco joints to keep the vibe righteous.

Then on level 2 Djs Snowboy & Perry Louis unleash the Soul, Funk and Groove on 45 direct to the whole ah you soul. Storming! The South London Soul Train finished off on level 3 with a new Northern Soul Room, hosted by New SLST resident The Legendary Rob Messer + Special guests - superb stellar dons of the rare 45 - DJ's Warren Boogaloo and Derek Mead.

All floors taking all passengers on a Non-Stop Magical Mystery Tour through all things Too Damn Funky. P-Funk to Jazz Funk, Soul Jazz to Rare Groove N’ Stax, Motown to Club Classics and Anthems. 

As always, Passengers are requested to check their Souls at the Station as this ones for good time party people only! No Bass Wobbles Here, Only Love, Funk and Souuuuuuuul.

£5 Adv from RA or £7 OTD / Takes place on the 1st Sat of each month w/ mid month 2 + 3 floor specials on an on-going basis.

NOTE: 500 TICKETS ALWAYS AVAILABLE ON THE DOOR.
However pls get there early as is always a roadblock, but once in it's well worth it :D

See you on the dancefloors fo sho!

Next Event: Sat April 19 - A 3 Floor, 4 Room Special with The Fontanelles Live https://www.facebook.com/events/209906742538579/
447838631983201.name: The South London Soul Train - Marvin Gaye 30th Anniversary Special

452438851553393.description:
A night of hip hop, breakbeat, and dubstep....

PETE CANNON & DR. SYNTAX
JMAN
SUPER SOUL SOLDIERS
PWORD
MAIR OF LONDON
DISTURBANCE
MR. BRISTOW

Pete Cannon  
 
"Boisterous Blackpudlian super-producer with hair so genius it's underappreciated in its own time.” 
For years – decades, even - hip hop music admirably trundled along, noticeably lacking a certain something.  
Nobody knew what that something was. All we knew was, it was something… Blackpool.  
Until the chance discovery of a battered old Moog synthesizer in a skip by a 12 year old Pete Cannon’s father gave birth to a musical prodigy who has become one of the most prolific producers and hairstyles in the country. It’s fair to say that if you have even a passing interest in UK hip hop music then there’s a good chance you probably already like Pete Cannon.  
Producer, DJ, Lad, Video Maker, Hair Mogul, Pete has amassed a list of production credits longer than some sort of massively long thing (like a huge snake or a tapeworm or something), with projects with the likes of Sway, Jam Baxter, Dirty Dike, Sonnyjim, Lunar C, Stig of the Dump, Million Dan and trans-Atlantic collaborations with Detroit legend Guilty Simpson, Action Bronson, Maffew Ragazino, with a cheeky play on US radio by DJ Premier thrown in for badman measure. Soz.  
Alongside producing the hugely successful and adorably named Dirty Dike album ‘Return of the Twat’ (High Focus records), 2013 also saw Pete yield mainstream chart success by producing two tracks on Rizzle Kicks’ album Roaring 20s - including the hit single Lost Generation.  
Outside of hip hop production, Pete has been known to occasionally get on the mic – although he definitely isn’t the elusive BARZ baron MC Double Mint – but does operate under the headband-donning, synth and bass impresario alias Opal Block, with a 12" vinyl release due in 2014 through Astral Black records. 
 
Dr Syntax 

“A Banbury rap baritone with sounds smoother than a sanded egg” 
As a fresh faced teen in the early 00s, Dr Syntax packed a knapsack full of Big Daddy Kane, Wu Tang and Redman cassettes, and bid farewell to the lush Oxfordshire countryside, moving to Brighton to follow his ambition of making hip hop music. 
This Slick Wittington rap pilgrimage soon bore fruit with Syntax becoming a prominent figure in the city's hip hop scene, winning various local battles, and forming The Menagerie with Professor Elemental, Tom Caruana and DJ Nick Maxwell.  
Shortly after the release of their debut album – 'Wild Kingdom' in 2003, Syntax met the legendary Foreign Beggars, promptly appearing on their debut 'Asylum Speakers' on 2 tracks (What Goes Up and Glacial). He became a regular collaborator, appearing on their next 2 albums 'Stray Point Agenda' and 'United Colours of Beggatron', touring extensively with them at festivals including  Glastonbury festival and Hip Hop Kemp.  
The release of his next album 'Self Taught' brought Syntax critical acclaim, appearing in Hip Hop Connection's 'Top 100 UK hip hop albums of all time' list, and high profile support slots at this time included Slum Village, The Pharcyde, People Under The Stairs, Necro, KRS One and Wu Tang Clan.  
After winning a UK heat of New York's legendary emcee competition 'End Of The Weak' in London in 2007, the release of second album 'Benny Huge' saw his first link with Pete Cannon, and following a move to Manchester, they have been performing live together ever since, including support slots for Ugly Duckling, Pharoahe Monch, and Chali 2na.  
A Slice Of Fried Gold followed Benny Huge – conceived after Shaun Of The Dead director Edgar Wright sent producer Tom Caruana all the audio from his films dialogue with carte blanche to sample on the album. The pair gained vocal fans in both Wright and Simon Pegg in the process, with the former playing album track ‘Universal’ in a mix for BBC Radio 1.  
In 2013, Chart sensations Rizzle Kicks enlisted Syntax in an incredible  line-up for the posse cut remix of their hit single, ‘Dreamers’, alongside Ed Sheeran, Pharoahe Monch, Chali 2na, Professor Green OV (Foreign Beggars) and Hinesy Hines.  
Syntax’s more recent work with Manchester band The Mouse Outfit has put Syntax at the forefront of one of the most exciting unsigned acts in the country. The 9-piece band and emcee collective garnered massive support from the UK hip hop scene and further afield, touring extensively across the country and Europe, with their debut album Escape Music being featured by US News website ABC in their best worldwide albums of 2013.

You can download the mixtape 'Still At Large', mixed by DJ Woody, for free from www.drsyntax.bandcamp.com.


JMAN, the verbally gifted, dreadlock sporting, baby faced charmer that has been compared to “Blanka when charging up from streetfighter when he spits” is a jack of all trades from Mcing/hosting Hip hop, Grime, Drum & Bass, Dubstep to producing, Dj’ing and engineering. Born & raised in Croydon, Jman was always eager to be involved in the Garage/Grime scene that surrounded him at a young age. Over the past couple years he's been all over the country and parts of Europe, drawing people in with immediate stage presence hitting you with conscious topics too vibrant comedy tracks and ending off with a surge of energetic madness using his notorious triple time flow that will leave you wanting more and more.

Jman is currently working on his debut Album "Auranography" featuring some of the U.K's finest and has released his first three singles “4D Reality”, “Any point of the day” & “Father figures” 

Over the years, Jman has hosted/Mc for: Skream, Benga, Artwork, Caspa, Rusko, Ntype, Kromestar, Coki, Distance, Hatcha, Terror Dainjah, Spooky, Spyro, Pantha, Cluekid, Lurka, Pinch, Redlight, Sukh Knight, Plastician, Wookie, Chase & status, Breakage, Chef, Komonazmuk, Reso, Joker, Mary Anne Hobbs, Doctor P, Trolley Snatcha, Funtcase, Flux Pavillion, 16 bit, Cookie monsta, Eddie K, The Others, Jakes, Chasing Shadows, Skizm, Scratch Perverts, Emalkay, Synkro, Kryptic Minds, Icicle, Benton, Unitz, Terrafonix, Jfb, Andy C, High Contrast, Shy FX, Alix Perez, DJ Fresh, Rockwell, Drumsound & bassline smith, Brookes bros, Original sin, Taxman, Wilkinson, Commix, N.Blackmarket, Crissy Criss, Benny Page, & more.

He then went on to perform his solo Hip hop/Grime here, there and everywhere being the support act for such artists as Immortal Technique, R.A the Rugged man, Afrika Bambaataa, Akil, Souls of Mischeif, DJ, Vadim, David Rodigan, Sha Stimuli, Rodney P, Taskforce, Skinnyman, Phi Life Cypher, Jehst, Klashnekoff, Micall Parkunsun, Foreign Beggars, Pmoney, Newham Generals, Lethal Bizzle & much more...

You can download his debut album 'Auranography' here
http://greasyvinyl.bandcamp.com/album/auranography

CHI SONO VICCI&ADAMO? 

Vicci e Adamo stanno rapidamente diventando la coppia d'insegnanti di blues preferita in Uk ed in Europa.

Insieme organizzano Sin City Blues e Stompin' the Blues, lezioni di Blues ad East London e sono responsabili di Blues at The Ritzy, un evento mensile di blues che si tiene nel Sud di Londra. Sono anche co-organizzatori dell'Espanish Blues Festival a Madrid. 

Sono due dei primi insegnanti di Blues europei ad essere andati ad insegnare negli USA, a NYC, in agosto, dove hanno insegnato a Nocturne Blues .

Adamo e Vicci hanno un'alchimia incredibile in pista, dove esprimono intensità, eleganza e musicalità. La loro passione per il blues è evidente e traspare dalle loro lezioni che donano ispirazione, dando un'impronta energica e dinamica, con un occhio alla creatività; imparerete con loro a sviluppare una profonda relazione con la musica, mentre loro vi incoraggeranno a trovare il vostro blues.

Entrambi insegnanti esperti, Vicci ed Adamo amano creare nuovi modi intuitivi per comunicare concetti tecnici ai loro studenti. Le loro lezioni sono interattive ed interdiscipinari e spesso comprendono disegni, discussioni, bande elastiche giganti e persino bacchette! :)

Per loro, il vostro corpo è uno strumento ed il vostro ballo è la musica che suonate, e vi aiuteranno a scoprire il modo in cui si muove il vostro corpo, sotto una luce nuova.
Nelle loro lezioni, imparerete davvero a sentire il Blues!

www.adamociarallo.com
www.viccimoore.com

Non perdete questa fantastica occasione
CONFESSIN' THE BLUES - A SERIES OF WORKSHOPS sta arrivando!!!

per info

471549089637212.description:
This month, your good friends at UNWIND, together with the fine folks of PLSTK & Future Sounds Classic proudly present:

SWINDLE
BUTTERZ . DEEP MEDI . RINSE FM - LONDON U.K.

ALSO WITH...

W1SHONE . MONIQUECOQUILLA . QUIXSLVR . MARKPLSTK 

UNWIND IS LOCATED AT BACK BAR
FRIDAY MARCH 28 . 21+ . 9PM - 2AM . $10 DOOR

---- 

SWINDLE
BUTTERZ . DEEP MEDI . RINSE FM
A man with a penchant for funk-fuelled productions with a grime twist, South-Londoner Swindle has firmly cemented his place on the UK’s electronic music circuit over the last three years thanks to his psychedelic approach to anything he turns his hand to.
Taking time to hone his craft through working with highly-revered UK artists such as Roll Deep, Chipmunk, Professor Green and Asher D, the producer began to focus his attention on solo instrumental productions with 2009’s Curriculum Vitae album showcasing his interpretation of Grime and electronic music on the whole that falls in the 140 BPM template.
 
His work instantly grabbed the attention of Rinse FM DJ duo Elijah & Skilliam and soon after they gave his music a platform on their weekly radio show and further down the line their record label, Butterz. This led to heightened interest from the wider electronic music scene and spurned singles such as Airmiles (released via-Planet Mu) and Mood Swings (released via Butterz) which propelled him onto the DJ circuit where he has become a mainstay in clubs up and down the UK and Europe.

The 25-year old prides himself on a distinct sound that is rooted in Funk – from George Clinton and Parliament Funkadelic to Roy Ayers he encapsulates the spirit of the sound in his work, whether it be the bass-heavy exploits of Pineapple or the intricate melodies on recent Deep Medi heavy hitter Do The Jazz.

2012 has already seen Swindle release Ignition (which featured one half of Newham General’s Footsie and Nadia Suliman) and Need To Know (co-produced with BBC Radio 1’s Toddla T) that featured the Roger Troutman-esque vocals of Sam Frank. He’s also teamed up with fellow Deep Medi artist Silkie on the production front with the single ‘Unlimited’ which finally saw the light of day on Butterz and their relationship promises to be a fruitful one if their back to back sets at seminal London club nights FWD and Butterz & Hardrive are anything to go by.

Showing that he’s no one-trick pony he’s also been featured in Q Magazine where he featured on Amy Winehouse’ Back To Black tribute compilation.  To commemorate the late-singer’s debut album, Swindle teamed up with songstress Baby Sol and covered ‘Some Unholy War’ – managing to add his creative input to rework a track from one of his musical inspirations.
The road ahead for Swindle looks promising. With more diverse projects on Deep Medi to come as well as holding down his radio show on Rinse FM there’s no doubt that he’s carrying the torch for funk and has no intention of letting it die out anytime soon.
471549089637212.name: UNWIND & PLSTK PRESENT - SWINDLE [BUTTERZ . DEEP MEDI . RINSE FM - LONDON U.K.]

Sat 3rd May 2014

************************************************************
Presenting: "GRACE EVORA" LIVE SATURDAY.....

Grace Evora was born on February 2, 1969, on the island of São Vicente in Cape Verde. 

Grace has a total of four albums released : Total Love I (1994), Total Love II (1997), Romance (1999), Aventura (2003) and with this brand new best of album(2012) makes this his fifth album.

In 2010 he released his first Live dvd "live @ Rotterdam", in that show he invited some of the artist's which he was working trough the years to perform with him.
For Grace a dream come true when he won an music award for the best dvd of the year 
At the Cabo Verde Music Awards_ ! that was his ultimate recognition for his work

There are not many artists from Cabo Verde which are so successful as Grace Evora. 
In the 25 years of making music he rise and rise to the top of his dreams.
Like he always says "The only limit is our God"
Grace Evora is an ambitious musician who wants to share his love and talent with the world !

"Real music still alive"
God bless

This is a weekly Bachata & Latin Night in the Heart of London, where all lovers of Bachata and Latin music and dance will be able to share their passion and dance the night away to their hearts' content. 

In order to make this a memorable night every week, we have set up a special program of lessons with The Latin Passion team, Cali Swing UK, plus special guests AND have carefully hand-picked a number of top and well established Bachata & Latin DJs from London, to give that special flavour and quality that a great night needs.

483130325128612.description:
HB004 Release party with : 

Perc (House Set - FIRST TIME IN UK ) [PercTrax / Submit Rec]
Enrico Mantini [Half Baked Records / UMM / Traxx Underground]
Greg Brockmann [Half Baked Records] 
Eyesmoon AKA Thomas Gimenez [Softporn]

-------------------------------------------------------

The previews are up and the response has been incredible, now it is time for the HB004 launch party!

First up is a man who was the last artist to take part in our Half Baked Workshop series. Perc, label boss of the brilliant Perc Trax will be playing a special house set for the first time ever to help us celebrate the launch of HB004. An internationally renowned DJ, Perc regularly plays at some of the biggest and best clubs right across the world, alongside some of the best DJ’s. Whilst he is known primarily for his techno, you should certainly not discount his knowledge of house music, with an ear for some incredible tracks we’re so excited to hear what he brings to play.

Next up is the man behind the EP, Enrico Mantini. A true pioneer of the deep house sound and a man who absolutely kills it every single time he plays for us. His releases on UMM in the nineties are still being played by DJ’s all over the world and the reception we’ve had of HB004 so far is no different! His signature, punchy, house sound can get the hands of any crowd up in the air - you can guarantee Enrico is going to get you dancing.

Half Baked resident Greg Brockmann is back! With us since the very beginning, Greg can always be relied on to entertain our beautiful London crowd. Now living in Berlin and providing music in some of the city’s most renowned clubs such as Tresor, Hoppetosse and Arena Club he is fully deserved of where he is today and it is a great pleasure to have such a good DJ as one of our residents.

Finally we have Eyesmoon or Thomas Gimenez as some of you may know him. A very close friend of the Half Baked Family, Thomas is originally from France but now living in London. As those of you who have seen him play before will know, he is an awesome DJ and he is definitely going to get you all warmed up perfectly for the rest of the night’s festivities. 

-------------------------------------------------------

This is a guestlist only party so if you want to be part of it then please send your full names to: 
guestlist@halfbaked.org.uk

Please remember that being on the guestlist does not mean you will definitely get in to the party. We reserve the right to refuse entry to people with the wrong attitude. This does not mean that only regulars can get in... Even if you have never been to Half Baked before but you possess the right attitude, and are respectful of yourself and those around you, then you have nothing to worry about! 


Half Baked Releases (Vinyl Only):

- HB 004 - Enrico Mantini with "Overflowing" 
https://soundcloud.com/half-baked-records/sets/hb004-enrico-mantini - RELEASED IN MARCH

- HB 003 - BirdsMakingMachine ( Fumiya Tanaka Remix) 
https://soundcloud.com/half-baked-records/sets/hb003-birdsmakingmachine 

- HB 002 - Mike Shannon with Slip it ( Thomas Melchior Remix) 
https://soundcloud.com/half-baked-records/sets/hb002-mike-shannon-east-side 

- HB 001- Various Artist with Seuil, Le Loup , Yakine & Robin Ordell
https://soundcloud.com/half-baked-records/sets/preview-hb001-v-a-le-loup 


Half Baked Records <3

493113284127173.description:
RAINBOW 

Spring addicted

Sabato 05.04.2014
dalle 23.00
SHABBA - Cantù - CO

Sorpresa!

Siamo tornati con un nuovo evento senza avvisarvi e senza fare nessun post sulla nostra pagina facebook ....
Abbiamo deciso di farvi una sorpesa e riportare il RAINBOW @ SHABBA ( la nostra piccola warehouse ) con un nuovo artista che sta facendo molto bene con uno dei gruppi più forti nella scena Londinese ....

Dal FUSE di Londra ROSSKO https://www.facebook.com/RosskoDJ

bio:
Nato nel 1984, Rossko vive nella periferia di Londra, in Essex, ed inizia ad innamorarsi della musica elettronica già all'eta di 14 anni.

Nella sua giovinezza, cresce con diversi generi e stili musicali, come l'Hip Hop, Jungle e Garage, che contribuiscono a maturare le sue sonorità, fino ad arrivare ad una forma più profonda di House & Techno.

All'età di 21 anni, Rossko si ritira dal calcio professionistico, a causa di un infortunio. Questa delusione, lo ha portato a focalizzare tutte le sue forze sulla musica e sul djing, in modo da poter esprimere tutto se stesso.

Dopo aver vissuto per 6 mesi a Madrid nel 2003, e dopo aver esplorato la scena underground londinese, la scelta di fare il dj fu naturale. 

Nel 2005-2008 Rossko diventa dj resident per Lost Souls, a Londra, party famoso per le feste diurne di sabato, presso il famigerato Public Life di Shoreditch. Qui perfeziona le sue qualità di dj, e le sue sonorità.

Dedica tutto il suo tempo e la sua fatica cercando sonorità originali, ed arriva così ad esibirsi in diversi clubs di Londra, quali:
The Key, The Cross, Egg, Turnmills, Ministry of Sound, Cafe1001, East Village and Home bar.
Arrivano poi performance in: Birmingham, Manchester, Southampton, Liverpool e più recentemente a Barcellona, Ibiza and Manheim, suonando al fianco di djs come: Loco Dice, Luciano, Nick Curly, Federico Molinari, H.O.S.H, Ray Okpara, Nima Gorji, Daniel Sanchez, Chris Liebing, Josh Wink, Tobi Neumann, Laidback Luke, Guy called Gerald, Tolga Fidan, Afrilounge, Men In Trees, Geddes.

Rossko è ora dj resident al Cerca Trova, ed al Fuse a Londra. 

STAY TUNED WITH US!

https://soundcloud.com/rossko

http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/rossko

495093080600658.description:
The London Pride Parade will take place on Saturday 28th June 2014 from 1pm in Central London.

Registration for groups to take part in the Parade is NOW OPEN at http://prideinlondon.org/festival/parade-registration/

What is the Parade?

The Parade is a procession of walking groups and floats which together march through streets in the heart of London to celebrate the LGBT+ community. It is one of the largest LGBT+ Parades in the UK and your chance to show lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people from all over the UK, Europe and further afield the very best that London has to offer. The aim of the Parade is to have fun, campaign and ultimately showcase the LGBT+ community in London, the UK and overseas.

When is the Parade and what time does it start?

The Parade takes place on Saturday 28 June 2014, commencing at 13:00.

What is the Parade’s route?

The Parade departs from Baker Street and the procession then follows this route:

1) Straight down Orchard Street

2) Turns left into Oxford Street and continues to Oxford Circus

3) Turns right into Regent Street and continues to Piccadilly Circus

4) Passing Eros, it then carries on down Lower Regent Street

5) Turns left into Pall Mall and continues round to Cockspur Street, passing the south side of Trafalgar Square

7) Round the roundabout into Whitehall.

The route is approximately just over two miles long. The route does not follow the normal traffic layout as the streets have been closed for Pride in London.

Where and when does the Parade finish?

The Parade finishes at Whitehall at approximately 16:30.

What is the theme for the Parade?

The theme for this year’s Parade is ’Freedom to…’. This can interpreted in any form that you like but we encourage you to to dress and decorate your float appropriately to represent your chosen subject.

Examples are ‘Freedom to marry’ or ‘Freedom to holiday’, there are countless options open to you and is the ideal opportunity to demonstrate how far we have travelled, the goals left to achieve and to celebrate the invaluable contribution that the LGBT+ community makes to London today.

- See more at: http://prideinlondon.org/parade-faqs/#sthash.oGRpcfca.dpuf
495093080600658.name: Pride in London 2014 - Parade

502178883234175.description:
Grupo Niche is Colombia’s most emblematic salsa orchestra who have conquered the world for more than thirty years with their Cali-style salsa. They recently released  the album Tocando el Cielo Con Las Manos, containing a bunch of potential hits and demonstrating that the band is still at the top of its game.

Grupo Niche was formed by Jairo Varela and a group of like-minded, talented musicians and made their debut with the release of Al Pasito in 1980. After becoming one of the major tropical acts in their native country, the group had the opportunity to participate in a salsa festival at New York’s Madison Square Garden in 1986.  The band brought their dynamic sound to Europe for the first time in 1989. During the ’90s, Grupo Niche turned to romantic lyrics, leaving behind their traditional songs based on social issues and had numerous hits such as “Ana Mil”, “La Canoa Rancha” ‘ Cali Aji”, ” Una Aventura” ‘ Cielo de Tambores”, ” Gotas de Lluvia” and ” Cali Pachanguero”. Richie Valdez is the new musical director and Grupo Niche is alive as ever. To close La LInea 2014 the band will present their new work (including their summer hit “Un día después” ) and all the old favourites from the golden age of Colombian salsa.

Supported by a top line-up of London’s finest Colombian salsa djs to keep you dancing to the madrugada.

Tickets £26 plus booking fee
