519746428142682.description:
Brazil’s hip hop revelation Karol Conka has bounced bang into the spotlight thanks to neon energy, hard graft and a sound all her own. Mashing up hip hop with baile funk, trap and Afro-Brazilian beats, Karol Conka’s sound is a uniquely Brazilian mix. Batuque just got freaked.

Winner of the 2013 Multishow Best New Artist award, with over 2 million views of her video singles (Boa Noite also features on the FIFA 2014 EA game) and a blazing collaboration with Buraka Som Sistema for Adidas, Karol Conka is now set to take on the world with the international release of her debut album on Mr Bongo Records.

Karoline dos Santos Oliveira, aka Karol Conka, first set foot on stage in her home-town Curitiba in southern Brazil aged just 17. Ten years later, the young MC has proved that she has what it takes to be one of the most distinctive voices from today’s high-grade Brazilian hip hop scene.

One of the very few female Brazilian hip hop artists to break out of the underground, Karol Conka’s wider success was kicked off by the 2011 single Boa Noite (nominated for an MTV Brazil award). With the Brazilian launch of the album via VICE magazine, downloads and shows across the country, the rapper, singer and songwriter – influenced by Brazilian Pop Music (MPB) and a big Azealia Banks fan – has gained national recognition and critical acclaim. Hugely respected by her peers, she has also shared the stage with rap pioneers Racionais MCs, hip-hop hero Criolo and label-mate Marcelo D2, as well as recording with major rap star Projota and samba veteran Luiz Melodia.

Tickets £11 plus booking fee

524016521040261.description:
A FREE DRUM & BASS + BASS MUSIC MASSIVE FOR APRIL!!

Warming you up like a spring breeze its a FREE SHOW for all the bass heads! This one has something for everyone!

We proudly bring you one of the most creative & diverse producers in D&B and the full spectrum of Bass Music!


ALIX PEREZ
Shogun Audio 
London, UK

https://www.facebook.com/alixperezmusic?fref=ts
http://www.SHOGUNAUDIO.co.uk

Belgian born Alix Depauw is the face behind production stature Alix Perez, now regarded as one of the most ground breaking and innovative producer-DJ of his generation. Shortly after his debut release, Alix sees himself catapulted to the fore front of the drum and bass scene carrying an ever growing reputation and sought after catalogue of music.

With a history of critically acclaimed releases on legendary labels such as Metalheadz, V recordings and Soul:R, Alix goes on to sign exclusively to Friction's very own imprint Shogun Audio, the home of his remarkable debut album "1984". Straying from the traditional confines of Drum and Bass, 1984 goes onto be one of the most highly anticipated and rated electronica albums of 2009 and beyond, gaining extraordinary reviews and extensive support globally. 

With collaborations ranging from legendary soul vocalist Peven Everett to lyricists Foreign Beggars, 1984's prominence in the history of drum and bass is further cemented with chart topping positions and rare reviews in publications such as the Metro, Mixmag and more. This leads onto remixes for staple labels such as Ninja Tunes for household names such as DJ Food, Hadouken and more.

530943417001955.description:
Songlines Magazine described Kishon Khan’s Lokkhi TeRra as “London’s best kept secret and probably the world’s best Afrobeat- Cuban-Bangladeshi group”. Here they team up with ex-Fela Kuti keyboardist Dele Sosimi, the UK’s multiple award winning Afrobeat ambassador, to bring you a new musical mash-up between heavyweights on the London scene. CubAfrobeat is a groovetrain, travelling between Lagos Nigeria and Havana Cuba, but with the waiting/dancing room in London.

Featuring members of both Lokkhi Terra and Dele Sosimi Afrobeat Orchestra, this is a world premiere and a pre-cursor to a much awaited album due out at the end of 2014. Everyone say “yeah, yeah, si, si”
530943417001955.name: Lokkhi Terra presents CubAfrobeat featuring Dele Sosimi / La Linea 14 / London 10 April

534080806706563.description:
Hi,
 
The Spring 2014 season has shuffled off the runways of the big fashion capital giving us plenty to look forward to.
 
A rainbow of soft springtime shades alongwith bright summer colours influences throughout our Designers Collections.
 
The collection brings you the best of pastel stories and ads a free spirit to the collection.
 
The best thing about the pastel trend is you can pick your most-flattering color and wear it with whatever silhouette flatters (and excites) U.
 
The ready to wear Spring Summer Collection 2014 will be presented in our Exhibition on 11th April 2014 at WelcomHotel Sheraton New Delhi, Saket.    


With the launch of our Spring Summer Edition, ‘London Market’ is the ultimate destination for ticking off your Summer shopping list.
 
From a minty-green board-shorts suit to a sexy-CEO lilac dress to sporty baby blue bombers, the sky's the limit on how pastel-happy you want to get.
 
Easy to wear and ultra-chic, billowy wide-leg trousers made a huge showing on the spring runways. I know what you're thinking...and, no, this trend isn't just for six-foot-tall supermodels, WE swear. Just look for a pair that's leaner on the flare and higher-waisted to elongate your frame.
 
The sporty layering pieces get edgier for spring with adventurously colorful prints, luxe textures and fabrics, and sporty-cool detailing—like mesh weaving and perforations;

Brace yourselves for a fierce roller derby grudge match between the intraleague teams of the full WFTDA league, the London Rockin’ Rollers, as they take to battle in SKATERS GONNA SKATE!

Will the Goldie Lookin’ Chain Gang steal victory away from their rivals? Will the NeanderDolls manage a mammoth win? Or will the competition find themselves spellbound by reigning winners the Voodoo Skull Krushers? All we know for sure is this will be one tight tournament of all female, full contact roller derby, right here in London.

Bout Day Schedule:
13:30 – Doors
14:00 – Voodoo Skull Krushers vs Goldie Lookin’ Chain Gang
15:00 – NeanderDolls vs Voodoo Skull Krushers
16:00 – Goldie Lookin’ Chain Gang vs NeanderDolls
17:10 – GRAND FINAL

Keep your eyes peeled on our Facebook (facebook.com/londonrockinrollers) and Twitter (twitter.com/Rockin_Rollers) for event updates and a live commentary of the bout!

Tickets will be available in advance online at WeGotTickets, priced £12 for adults and £5 for children (plus booking fees) at WeGotTickets.com or on the door on the day priced £15 for adults and £7 for children. 
ADULT TICKETS: http://www.wegottickets.com/event/263971
CHILDREN'S TICKETS: http://www.wegottickets.com/event/263972

Our sponsors Skate Attack and Queens of the Sin Bin will present, in addition to a London Rockin’ Rollers merchandise stand. Food and drink will be available at the venue throughout the event. Afterparty shenanigans will ensue so feel free to come and celebrate with us after the bout – who knows, you might even end up part of our human pyramid!

551925468236204.description:
2 day Weekend seminar that will rejuvenate your salah.
For Brothers and Sisters 

The prayer of the believer is the single most important form of worship and means of connection with one’s Lord. It is the medium through which the believer literally speaks to Allah and the a fountain from which one drinks on a daily basis to reinvigorate the soul and re establish one’s purpose in life.

I don’t know about you, but the above description of the prayers sounds somewhat alien to most of us right? The question is why? What’s missing and how can we make a change to revive the ritual?

This course seeks to address this very question…

This course will:

- Share the secret of how to attain khushu (concentration & devotion) in the prayer
- Explain both the outward and inward meanings of all the utterances in the prayer
- Explain the significance of the physical motions in the prayer
- Describe the thoughts & emotions one should experience in an awakened prayer
- Provide practical advice on how to develop the prayer through the above



Teachers: 
Shaykh Shams Adduha Muhammad 
Shaykh Mujahid Ali 
Shaykh Abdur Rahman Anwar 
Shaykh Abu Aaliyah - Surkheel Sharif

Extensive coursenotes will be provided for free

Note: this is not a fiqh course. The focus is on the quality of prayer as opposed to the rules of prayer.
551925468236204.name: Awakening the Prayer - London Seminar

.:~.: DIAMONDS on the floor :.~:.

Diamante, do grego 'adamas', significa invencível e 'diaphanes', que significa transparente. Era usado em batalhas como símbolo de coragem.
Os antigos o chamavam de pedra do sol, devido ao seu brilho faiscante e os gregos acreditavam que o fogo de um diamante refletia a chama do amor.
Diamante simboliza portanto, a força e a eternidade do amor.
Lapidados os diamantes mais preciosos da nossa cidade, reunimos as suas belezas e particularidades em uma única pista de dança, uma única vibe, em uma noite para se tornar inesquecível para os amantes da house music.

560800934017889.description:
So....these past few years ehhh....they have been testing to say the least, but i managed to pull it all off pretty well  Got the Girl of my Dreams, Played at some of the most Momentous Parties i have ever attended, let alone get the privilege to play at, i've met some Wonderful People, and i've also lost some......, but as they say, 'It's all part of God's eternal plan..', whether it's fair or not, we all have our destiny, and destiny is nature's law.

Meet my Godson, he's a bright, bubbly little man who never fails to make me grin, but through that beautiful smile, he's having to endure hour's of physiotherapy because he finds it hard to move around on his own, also he has to labour through countless test's and other investigations and he's not even fully developed yet, at this point although things weren't perfect for me future wise, at least i had my health and the hope that anything was possible.

At this very moment, he's a little too young for us to know the full extent of his condition, but, until then he has to go abroad (Because its going to be major cheaper than here!) to receive quality therapy, which hopefully will allow him the very best start in life that he can be given, but this can cost an astronomical amount of money, much more than any new family could possibly afford in the modern day UK, and i gotta say i salute his parents who are very good friends of mine.

I have over the past few months, been kinda feeling sorry for myself with regards to a fair few things, but tonight, i had what you might call an epiphany, and that is this, if you live your life in the past, your past will destroy you, make no mistake about that, the key is to not live either in the past, or to hope for the future, but is simply to be happy for what you have now, the present, as that is all you have ever had in the first place.

I have been changing my life around, living healthier and removing the poisons in my life (Well most of em!lol), aspiring to the more meaningful and precious aspects of my world, and i am from here on in going to make every second count, trust me on this!! 

So, i would just like to say, every penny made by any of my tracks or remixes of the next year, i will be donating to my little corner of the fund to help him over the pond for his treatment and anything else i can possibly help with, plus i will be doing the 'Electric Run' in London in April to also raise a bit to try and help him along, and this is where you can help, please visit my justgiving page and if you feel you can help, sponsor me to help Luka's cause, any amount, no matter how small, can go a long way to helping him start to try and normal happy and healthy life.

Link to JustGiving page: https://www.justgiving.com/yimby/godfatherfund

Link to Electric Run Page:- http://electricrun.co.uk/


I am thinking, i might be going on a mission this year for the greater good and your support would be, as always, very welcome  .

God bless you :) 

Carl xx
560800934017889.name: Do just one good thing today that will make you feel wonderful for weeks, sponsor me at the London 'Electric Run' in aid of Breast Cancer Awareness & the Godfather Fund :)

563231470431674.description:
De plek waar Blur, The Libertines en The Kooks begonnen. Komende editie op vrijdag 9 en zaterdag 10 mei in Paradiso.

In 2014 gaat London Calling alweer zijn 22e jaargang in. Het festival dat in Paradiso wordt georganiseerd biedt een plek voor nieuw en opkomend talent uit Engeland, Amerika en ver daarbuiten. Op de voorgaande edities boekten niemand minder dan Blur, Placebo, The Libertines, The Kooks, Bloc Party hun eerste successen. In 2013 waren onder meer Jagwar Ma, MS MR, London Grammar, Palma Violets en Unknown Mortal Orchestra te gast op het halfjaarlijkse festival.

------------------
BEVESTIGD

Vrijdag 9 mei: 

Jungle - Wolf Alice - Menace Beach – Eyedress - The Proper Ornaments - Folly and the Hunter – Hospitality – Teleman  - Happyness - The John Steel Singers e.a.

Zaterdag 10 mei:

 Royal Blood - Arthur Beatrice - Wild Cub - Ryan Keen – Gambles –Telegram - Desperate Journalist – Childhood – Bohicas - Public Access T.V. – Solids - The Delta Riggs - The Neighbourhood e.a.

------------------
Desperate Journalist uit Londen heeft misschien nog geen langspeler uit, maar de vier nummers die online zijn uitgebracht werden wel meteen opgemerkt door de Britse en Amerikaanse muziekblogs. Spannende post-punk met pittige vrouwelijke vocalen, denk Siouxsie and the Banshees, Savages, Bleached. Overtuigend, krachtig en live ongetwijfeld een sensatie.

Wolf Alice was dé Britse hype van 2013. Geen blog dat er niet over schreef. Het Nederlands livedebuut beleefde Wolf Alice op London Calling in de Tolhuistuin, waar de reacties lovend waren.De muziek van Wolf Alice is sprankelend, spannend en gruizig. Ergens tussen het fluisterwerk van Mazzy Star en de lo-fi klanken van Pavement en The Fall in. 

Arthur Beatrice uit Londen maakt mysterieuze, minimale popmuziek – een beetje zoals The xx, maar meer indie dan electronisch – en ze staan op het punt om internationaal door te breken. De band heeft een frontman en frontvrouw: Orlando Leopard en de sierlijke Ella Girardot. De ritmesectie wordt bezet door de broers Elliot en Hamish Barnes.

Elliott Hammond, toetsenist van Wolfmother, is de frontman van The Delta Riggs. Deze band uit Sydney maakt pure rock ’n roll, met invloeden uit 70’s psychedelica en hardrock. Het nummer ‘Hex.Lover.Killer.’ is een heerlijk aanstekelijk rock ’n roll anthem voor fans van Wolfmother, Jet, Cage The Elephant, The Hives.

Ice Choir. Pet Shop Boys, Erasure, Spandau Ballet,  Visage, Johnny Hates Jazz, Tears for Fears en dat dan door de drummer van Pains Of Being Pure At Heart dan heb je Ice Choir. Het project van Kurt Feldman -want zo heet hij  - is een ode aan de jaren  tachtig. Gladde Synths, barokke vocalen, romantische teksten en een hitsige drumbeat. 

De muziek van Proper Ornaments is te omschrijven als perfecte indiepopmuziek, minimalistisch en klassiek, aanstekelijk en tijdloos. The Velvet Underground en Jesus & Mary Chain, maar dan iets meer gepolijst en moderner, zoals ook Jacco Gardner dat aanpakt. Proper Ornaments tourde in 2013 met Crystal Stilts en is op dit moment bezig met het eerste studioalbum. 

Amber Papini is de spil van de New Yorkse indieband Hospitality. Ze is een eigenaardige zangeres en songschrijver met een typisch Brits accent, maar dan met een Texaans tintje en haar liedjes getuigen van een enorme muzikale verbeeldingskracht. Tegendraadse indie. Vrolijk met een scherp toontje. Ze zou zo het derde zusje van Kim en Kelley Deal kunnen zijn. Het debuutalbum ‘Trouble’ komt zeer binnenkort uit.

Gambles is Matthew Daniel Siskin uit New York: hij maakt prachtige, ontroerende folkpopliedjes die veel gevoelens, emoties en tragedies verbergen. Op zijn debuutalbum ‘Trust’ is hij te horen als kalme zanger met akoestische gitaar. Hij laat zich niet omschrijven als eenzame troubadour, maar als getalenteerde folkzanger die zijn verhalen wil vertellen, en waar we nog veel van gaan horen.

San Fermin laat wervelende orkestrale chamberpop met allerlei stemmen en arrangementen op een natuurlijke manier samenkomen. De band werd opgericht in Brooklyn, door Ellis Ludwig-Leone. Na zijn studie aan Yale University raakte ze bevriend met Nico Muhly (Sufjan Stevens, Grizzly Bear) met wie hij zijn eerste composities schreef. Pas in 2013 werd het eerste werk onder de naam San Fermin uitgebracht: het debuutalbum ‘San Fermin’ werd met maar liefst 22 muzikanten opgenomen en is een sterke kennismaking met de band. 

Menace Beach is een ware indiesupergroep, bestaande uit o.a. Matt Johnson van Hookworms, Rob Lee van Pulled Apart By Horses, Nestor Matthews van Sky Larkin, Paul Draper van Mansun en Matt Spalding van You Animals. Menace Beach brengt allerlei alternatieve stijlen samen in zijn muziek: 90’s grunge, Madchester Britpop, shoegaze, en fuzzy noiserock. Een krachtig en opwindend geheel, voortgebracht door enkele grootheden uit de hedendaagse indiescene.

Als een ruimtemannetje zou vragen hoe ziet een indieband eruit? Dan kun je het beste een foto van de Britse band Telegram laten zien. En ook de muziek zou een perfecte inleiding zijn in het genre. Licht psychedelische gitaren, achternagezeten drums, bezwerende zang en verslavende refreinen. Zelf noemt de band het bootgaze. “Lots of people try and call it psych-rock or shoegaze, but… I mean, we just wear boots – bootgaze!”. 

Childhood is een band uit London die hypnotiserende pop maakt en op het punt van doorbreken staat. Zomers, catchy, maar met een goed scherp randje. NME is groot fan en schrijft: “A pinch of Creation Records shoegaze, a fistful of Sarah Records jangle, some baggy swagger and the right mix of laconic dreaminess and croon-along hooks”. 

Solids is een Canadees duo dat met veel enthousiasme rockmuziek maakt, geïnspireerd door Dinosaur Jr., Sonic Youth en Superchunk. Oftewel: melodieuze grungerock met een flinke laag aan distortion en feedback effecten. ‘Blame Confusion’ is het debuutalbum dat afgelopen oktober werd uitgebracht bij Fat Possum Records (The Black Keys, Iggy and the Stooges).

Jungle is een Brits duo dat vorig jaar doorbrak met de single ‘Platoon’. De ongooglebare band schopte het met dit lied tot de BBC Sound Of 2014 lijst en sindsdien gaat het razendsnel met deze hype. Noem het indiefunk, urban tribal, wereldsoul: het is in ieder geval fris , hip, swingend en verslavend.

Royal Blood klinkt als een grote gitaarrockband maar is een hip duo zonder gitaar. Onvoorstelbaar  maar waar. Zanger-bassist Mike Kerr en drummer Ben Thatcher uit Brighton zorgen samen voor dit kunststukje. Bikkelhard, onverwoestbaar, met een muur van geluid en zonder enige concessie overstuurde de band reeds twee singles de wereld in die beiden insloegen als een bom. 

“New York’s Hottest New Band”, aldus NME: Public Access T.V. heeft met de single ‘Monaco’ de hype flink aangewakkerd. De band maakt springerige, strakke indierock die direct doet denken aan The Strokes. Afgelopen januari speelde zij pas de allereerste show; vers van de pers dus. Veel is er over Public Acces TV nog niet bekend, maar dat maakt de buzz rondom het jonge drietal des te groter. Absoluut niet te missen op London Calling.

The Bohicas is een talentvolle Britse band die intelligente gitaarmuziek maakt vol verrassende wendingen, hooks en catchy refreintjes. De band is getekend door Domino Records die reeds de opwindende debuutsingle ‘XXX/Swarm’ uitbracht. Muzikaal en qua ambitie zit de band ergens tussen labelgenoten Franz Ferdinand en Arctic Monkeys in. En die werden ook snel heel groot.

Teleman is een Londens trio dat uit de as van Pete and the Pirates is herrezen. Toen het heel stil werd rond deze indieband lieten de leden Thomas Sanders, Jonny Sanders en Pete Cattermoul weten verder te gaan onder de naam Teleman. Met z’n drieën maken ze prachtige pop met veel samenzang en wonderschone melodieën. Denk aan Django Django en Alt-J met “ouderwetse” invloeden van The Beach Boys en The Velvet Underground.

De singer-songwriter Ryan Keen is een artiest die een mooie warme stem heeft, een virtuoos gitarist is en hitgevoelige liedjes schrijft. De jonge Brit klinkt met zijn band eigenlijk een beetje alsof Ray Lamontagne bij Coldplay zingt. Kan wel eens een grote popster worden die Ryan Keen. Het debuutalbum ‘Room For Light’ is uit.

Kins, verantwoordelijk voor dromerige, gitaargedreven popmuziek, werd in 2010 opgericht door frontman Thomas Savage. De band uit Brighton balanceert op het randje van psychedelica met hun uitgesponnen liedjes van meer dan vijf minuten, maar klinkt tegelijkertijd fris, daadkrachtig en bescheiden.

De muziekscene uit Montreal is op zijn hoogtepunt: Arcade Fire, Patrick Watson, Grimes, en natuurlijk Folly and the Hunter. Deze veelbelovende folkgroep bracht in 2013 ‘Tragic Care’ uit en is sindsdien niet meer te stoppen. Melodieuze folk met veel ruimte voor sfeer, arrangementen en eigenaardige geluidjes. 

Eentje om in de gaten te houden, deze “bedroom-producer” Eyedress. Dit is het project van de 23-jarige Idris Vicuna (gitarist van Bee Eyes). In zijn soloproject kan hij zijn electronische klanken kwijt: langzame beats, galmende vocalen en een beetje new wave. Heerlijk om eindeloos bij weg te dromen.

Fans van Cut Copy, Django Django en Crystal Fighters opgelet: hier is Wild Cub. ‘Thunder Clatter’ is de single die wereldwijd de radio’s overnam. Tropisch, opzwepend en bij vlagen een beetje melancholisch zoals New Order of The Cure. 

'Sweater Weather' is de veel gedraaide single van de band The Neighbourhood uit Californië. Dit nummer is een flinke hit aan het worden. In eigen land heeft ‘Sweater Weather’ het reeds geschopt tot de nummer 1 positie in de Billboard's Alternative Charts en nu is de rest van de wereld aan de beurt. De single staat op het debuutalbum ‘I Love You’ dat vol staat met deze hitgevoelige indie. Donker en duister met een fris hip randje.


The John Steel Singers uit Brisbane, Australië maken melancholische, urgente indierock. Deze nieuwkomers kunnen niets verkeerd doen bij fans van Broken Social Scene, Deerhunter  en Cloud Control. De muziek wordt door de zesmansformatie vrolijk aangekleed door spannende arrangementen en blazers. Optimistisch, opgewekt en luchtig. ‘Everything’s A Thread’ is het debuutalbum dat zojuist is uitgebracht.

579783978759015.description:
She is Marinah. Her name was Marina Abad and in an earlier life she was lead singer and central to the creative force within Barcelona’s Ojos de Brujo.

Marinah presents her new project El Baile de las Horas for the first time in the UK. Marinah’s new sound combines some elements from Ojos but also a new softness in her voice and a fresh sense of positivity in her music and lyrics.

Marinah composed all the tracks on the new El Baile de las Horas record and her long time collaborator and live band member Carlos Sarduy produced and arranged them. Carlos has frequently worked with Javier Limón, Buika, Ainhoa Arteta and Ojos de Brujos and his trumpet playing can be heard on the films ‘Chico & Rita’ by Fernando Trueba and Pedro Almodovar’s ‘The Skin I Live In’.

Marinah says, “This is the first stop on a journey that has just started and that without a doubt will take us to different and unfamiliar ports.

These songs that appear on the record have been with me for a while, they sounded fresh and different in my head. I felt as if they were part of me, as a woman, a mother and a musician.

I had to make this record to be loyal to the present…. So I could evolve, continue being sincere and continue learning about myself.

Whilst writing the songs, I was listening to the voices of children, to strings, to electric guitars, flamenco guitars…. and to the waves of the sea.”
579783978759015.name: Marinah (from Ojos de Brujo)  / La Linea 14 / London 11 April

583688118371184.description:
This Buena Vista Social Club piano prodigy and Havana Cultura star has grabbed Cuban jazz by the horns and drawn it, hot, stylish and sultry, into the 21st century. Roberto Fonseca looks back to his Caribbean roots while striking forwards with a sensuous lyricism that effortlessly updates Cuba’s musical lineage.

Fonseca is paired tonight with London’s Family Atlantica whose debut record release last year on Soundway and punchy live shows have quickly won them a following . Their sounds pairs West Africa with Latin America’s Atlantic Coast, with a London beat firmly in the middle.

“It’s a heartbeat for contemporary Afro-Cuban life.’ Times

‘A fabulously gifted pianist, composer and band leader with a gift for melody that outshines more celebrated peers…one of a new breed who can transcend musical boundaries through sheer quality’ Guardian

‘A genre-busting tour de force… the lyricism of his playing recalls Herbie Hancock but he can animate the courtly dramas of Cuban tradition… a joyous poignant offering’ Observer

‘Sensuous, fresh, modern – Roberto Fonseca brings the piano dazzlingly to life’ Daily Telegraph
583688118371184.name: Roberto Fonseca + Family Atlantica / La Linea 14 / London 8 April

Spring is here! And it’s time for another Liquicity event in Amsterdam. Make sure to gather your energy and keep the 19th of April free, as we will return with a night you will not forget. We present to you a unique line-up including UK's finest: London Elektricity, well known for tracks such as "Just One Second" and praised for his wide array of musical influences. We will also bring the all time liquid legends: Bachelors of Science who fly over all the way from the US to be part of this spectacular night!

Another up and coming artist, well known to the Liquicity YouTube listeners, is: Dimension. He will expose you to one hour of funky dance floor Drum and Bass! The night won’t be complete without a few of our own. Maduk, Feint and Rameses B will of course be there too. They will be making sure you can enjoy yet another memorable night, full of warm bass lines and melodic bangers.

Hugh Hardie, who's known for his smooth and colorful music, will be making his awaited debut in the Netherlands! With instant classics such as "Tearing Me Apart" he is on his way to make a name for himself in the Drum and Bass scene. Furthermore, we’re bringing in Vandera & Dave Owen for some more liquid flavour. Both of them have been signed to LTJ Bukems “Good looking” label and will make sure to keep the liquid rolling.

So don’t miss out on our final event before the summer break!

THE KING OF BACHATA "ROMEO SANTOS"
Live in Concert in London @ O2 Academy Brixton

Following on from Latin Grammy nominations, sell out stadiums in Latin America, America and Europe, including New York's Madison Square Gardens through out his ‘Formula 1 Tour’; The King of Bachata ROMEO SANTOS will be finally coming to London with his complete band for an exclusive 2 hour performance at the Capital’s famous O2 Academy Brixton on 30th March 2014 as part of his highly anticipated "Formula 2 Tour”. 

He will be performing his catalogue of hits, including Latin Grammy nominated hit song "Propuesta Indecente", and world renowned tracks including "Promise", "La Diabla" and "Mi Santa" alongside many more, much to the delight of his UK fans! 

Not only will he be performing his Solo Hits but hits from his famous 10 Year career as lead singer of legendary Bacahta band AVENTURA as well as songs from his upcoming album; "Formula 2".

601023463286671.description:
Focallocal is a community creating positive collective action for social and cultural change. Our events and projects are designed to bring people closer together and make the world a happier more connected place. visit www.focallocal.org to join us!

We run monthly Pillow Fights for Connection so of course we couldnt miss joining the Urban Playground Movements yearly International Pillow Fight Day: http://pillowfightday.com/about.php

....

Invite all your friends, this is going to be a wonderful memory you and they will cherish for the rest of your life!!! do not accept no for an answer from them, yourself or your boss!

The fight starts in the square at 3pm and goes until your arms are too exhausted to continue, when most people take their pillows to St James's Park to relax in the sunshine.

Please don't find yourself looking in the mirror on the 8th wondering how much cooler you'd look today, and how much bigger your smile would be if you had been at a Humungous pillow fight in the heart of London yesterday! ..no-one wants to be that girl/guy!!

Notes:
1) Cheap pillows can scratch without a pillow case so please bring one along.
2) Just because its a pillow doesn't mean you cant hurt folk, if you a big strong person hitting a lil person take it easy.
3) Do not hit anyone with a camera, they are our friends!
4) If someone's got a hard, heavy pillow, please tell them! or they will happily carry on swinging obliviously upsetting everyone around them.
5) Take your pillow away with you (i normally give mine to the homeless on the way home).
6) Smile and have fun - today is all about positivity!

update: the London mayors office have asked me to cancel this event. as its not mine i have no ability to do this, but they are trying to cancel this event by closing off part of the square - it's up to you if you choose to go or not. 

you'd be welcome to join us at our monthly pillow fights for connection on www.focallocal.org instead :0)
601023463286671.name: Focallocal.org joins London International Pillow Fight Day 2014 @ Trafalgar Square

604736286256490.description:
Heaven on May 4th officially SOLD OUT. No tickets available on the door. Doors open at 9:30pm.

Celebrating 18 years of Hospital Records!

First up, a little history lesson... The first ever Hospitality event took place at Herbal way back in 2001. After five years of monthly shindigs at the East end sweatbox, Hospitality took the giant leap to super club Heaven for quarterly parties, which instantly became the stuff of legend. With Hospital Records artists like High Contrast, London Elektricity, Danny Byrd and Cyantific the stars of the show, and playing host to special guests such as Andy C, Fabio & Grooverider, DJ Marky, Noisia, Teebee and Calyx, Hospitality @ Heaven revolutionised and revived drum & bass in the capital. Matter at the O2 Arena became our new home in 2008 and after nine completely sold out parties at the Greenwich institution it was time to move on again! 2010 marked the beginning of a new era for the London event, as Hospitality took over the O2 Academy in Brixton, where we still to this day showcase spectacular line ups to the masses.

We are celebrating Hospital Records 18th birthday next year, so in honour of this milestone we are taking an emotional trip down memory lane by revisiting iconic venues across London that have helped to make Hospitality events what they are today.

February 7th we head up to Building Six at the O2 in North Greenwich. Memories of hosting parties at the O2 stretch back to 2008, when we began our 2-year residency at superclub Matter, where each & every show was a sold-out, unmissable experience. Fast forward to today & we are returning to the O2 to brand new venue Building Six, where we will be bringing a world class lineup, soundsystem and atmosphere... as standard.

Then on May 4th we will be stepping even further back into the history books for a one-off spectacular at our beloved Heaven – a maze of dancefloors, bars and sound systems located under the arches of Charing Cross station in the heart of central London, a nightclub engraved on the heart of British rave culture. Those who remember the original Hospitality events at Heaven will know these were really special occasions, and we aim to recapture that vibe in 2014 with the best artists and the friendliest crowd. And for those who never made it to Heaven all those years ago, this is your chance to experience an integral piece of Hospitality history.

Both events promise to be something to saviour, completely unique whilst including everything you love about Hospitality.

To join us on our journey, simply follow the links below (or the "Get Tickets" link above) & we'll see you on the dancefloor!

Building Six - Feb 7:
SOLD OUT

Heaven - May 4:
SOLD OUT
 
x

607129419372561.description:
CALL FOR ARTISTS - MODERN PANIC V - LONDON 2014

We are now accepting submissions for artists to feature in our next exhibition. Applications will be accepted from all styles and forms of art, from artists working in any medium, from any location in the world.

Concept
The Modern Panic exhibitions are inspired by the work of the original Panic Movement, which was comprised of artists Alejandro Jodorowsky, Fernando Arrabal and Roland Topor, who created provocative live arts events in France during 1960s. The works intended aim was to slice through the bourgeois art world with the aim to be a catalyst towards liberation of thought within the viewer.  Modern Panic follows in the footsteps of this movement and aims to exhibit the new wave of modern artists.

Following on from our previous exhibitions, we are looking for work that covers one or more of the following areas: Panic /  Provocation / Controversy / Surreal / Outsider Art / Grotesque / Playful/Trickster / Existential / Inner Beauty / Confrontational / Disarming / Subverting /
Political / Satire / Modern Society / Freedom of Speech / Boundary breaking / Emotionally Powerful

If you think you work might work, please complete an application.

Exhibition Date
Nov 2014 - London

Applications 
You will need to prepare a short submission proposal about your piece(s) (approx 100 words) & biography (no more than 300 words). Please upload one clearly labelled image with your name and title or a selection of images in a clearly labelled zip/rar folder. Please keep images to a small size (i.e. no larger than 2mb each) For video submission - put a link in the proposal section. 

Entries close 1st July 2014

To submit your work please visit :
www.guerrillazoo.com/artist-submissions

----------- WHAT IS CLAVE LATINA FESTIVAL ---------

-------------www.clavelatinafestival.com-------------

68 ARTISTS / 38 HOURS OF DANCE WORKSHOPS + 3 DAYS OF PARTIES / + LIVE BAND + MAIN SALSA ROOM + A DEDICATED BACHATA ROOM

- Clave Latina Festival is an event that celebrates the world heritage of Latin music and dance.

- ‘Salsa is not a rhythm, it’s a concept……an open, ever-evolving musical, cultural, socio-political concept’ Willie Colon

- Besides the social and fun aspects, the Festival aims to also highlight and promote the cultural, artistic and historical aspects of Latin culture, offering the public a richer and fuller experience

- CLAVE LATINA FESTIVAL will feature: 
Renowned national & international dancers & dance instructors, as well as musicians, specialised DJs, recognised writers and academics, record collectors, photographers, film makers, graphic designers....

"London Calling Band Contest 2014" è un concorso rivolto ad artisti e band che propongono musica inedita e originale, ideato e realizzato da Crazy Bull Café Genova in collaborazione con Plastic Monkey.

I vincitori del concorso avranno la possibilità di esibirsi dal vivo all'interno di un esclusivo live club di Londra, tra giugno e luglio 2014.
Anche per chi arriverà al secondo e al terzo posto sono previsti dei premi che verranno elargiti da RedHouse Strumenti Musicali:
per il secondo classificato sarà possibile sfruttare per 3 ore la sala di registrazione per la produzione di una demo.
Il terzo classificato, invece, riceverà un buono spesa del valore di € 100,00.
E' previsto un premio speciale per chi collezionerà il maggior numero di voti da parte del pubblico.

In collaborazione con Andrea Di Marco, Caterina Angeli e Paola Popa. 

Scoprite il regolamento e scaricate il modulo d'iscrizione al contest: 

http://www.crazybullgenova.it/london-calling-band-contest-2014/

A celebration of Czech culture with music by three giants of the Czech school of composition. Opening the programme is the whimsical and little known Suk Trio, followed by the only trio written by the man widely regarded in his homeland as the father of Czech music, Smetana. The concert finishes with the last and most famous of Dvořák’s piano trios, The Dumky.

Ticket available at:

RALLY: 6pm, Downing Street

The People's Assembly is calling a national day of protest and action on Budget Day 2014. 

David Cameron announced last year that austerity needs to be permanent, and in January, Osborne announced a further £25 billion in cuts. 

We want to demonstrate for a Budget that benefits the majority not the few.

Send Osborne a message:
We are putting together a short film with a powerful message to Osborne, we don’t want his austerity budget – this is what we do want.

Send us a short message of yourself, your friends, family, colleagues, and get onto the streets and ask the public what they want to say to Osborne.

If you have any questions please contact: info@rovingeyefilm.co.uk

622951824421452.description:
Line Up:
Sven Väth
Tim Green
Timo Maas Official Page
Anja Schneider
Ralf Kollmann

Visuals by Reach Visuals

In November Cocoon returned for a sell out show at Building Six, making North Greenwich feel a little like Ibiza and left us dreaming of Mediterranean sunrises. This spring Cocoon returns with a medley of producers that have consistently been at the forefront of the European DJ circuit. Joining talisman Sven Vath in the main room will be Tim Green whose reverberated himself through the realms of house and techno with a distinctive charm.

Calling on the very capable mixing fingers of mobilee records to go up against in the Cocoon posse in room 2; label owners Anja Schneider and Ralf Kollmann will be representing the Berlin based outfit. Battling against Timo Maas this will be Anja’s first set in London since she tore apart the Tobacco Dock New Year’s Day party. Seeking only inspiration from the world’s best clubs has allowed Tim Maas to create a sound that’s direct and gripping. Reflecting exactly the mindset of what Cocoon has always been.

More Information:

vip@londonwarehouseevents.co.uk

ANY GIVEN MONDAY "I LOVE LONDON" @ QUBE

Lunedìì 7 Aprile presso QUBE, via di Portonaccio n. 212 (Roma)

INGRESSO 5€ con FREE DRINK !!!

QUESTO LUNEDI SI CELEBRERA' LA TERRA D'ALBIONE ED IN PARTICOLARE LA CAPITALE, LONDRA.

Nel campo della musica moderna, Londra ha visto la formazione di importanti band e alcune tra le migliori di sempre, tra cui: One Direction, Pink Floyd, Genesis, Yes, Queen, The Who, Iron Maiden, Coldplay, The Clash, Sex Pistols, Rolling Stones e Duran Duran. Sono inoltre nati nella città i cantautori Amy Winehouse e David Bowie, mentre Freddie Mercury vi ha a lungo vissuto. 

E ALLORA MEMBERS, SCALDATE LE UGOLE, PRONTI A CANTARE :

I LOVE LONDON !!!

Hola. Me llamo Mimi .
I love London.

* * * * *

Il lunedì a Barcellona, Londra, Berlino, San Francisco e in molte altre città non è un giorno come gli altri. Accantonati i monotoni impegni e le incombenze dell’inizio, tutti si ritrovano e si perdono nella notte più esclusiva della settimana. La Night Life romana è finalmente competitiva nella scena off mondiale grazie a VEGA e al suo ANY GIVEN MONDAY. Un lunedì per pochi. Scorretto, insolito, non convenzionale, caratterizzato dalle esuberanti sonorità vintage dell’indie-rock e dalle afose rotondità dell’electro. Qualcuno dica a Bob Geldof che ormai “I don’t like mondays” è un’affermazione superata.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY si discosta, sia esteticamente che concettualmente, dai canoni usuali del divertimento notturno. È un format-party “glocale” che importa elementi esterofili all’avanguardia, personalizzandoli notevolmente, e riadattandoli alla realtà off capitolina.

È una festa MADE AT HOME, spiazzante per la sua diversità, dove l’imperativo non è apparire, ma divertirsi. È un happening, un carnevale perenne, è musica, teatro, danza, arte, moda, video, televisione, avanspettacolo e molto, ma molto di più, del prodotto che si ottiene moltiplicando tutti questi fattori tra di loro. È un posto incantato, fuori dal tempo e dallo spazio, veramente FREE e OPEN. È un contenitore difficile da descrivere dove c’è tutto e il contrario di tutto, sempre uguale ma in continuo mutamento.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è un party dall’animo sensibile, il vestito vintage, l’aspetto kitsch e il cuore naif, con uno sguardo avanguardistico e una straordinaria capacità di prendersi in giro e prendere in giro una città tanto seria come Roma. È controcorrente e retrò, ma sempre contemporaneo e attuale, pieno di vizi e stravaganze.

È stato indubbiamente la pluripremiata novità degli ultimi anni, definito da molti addetti ai lavori un “asso piglia tutto che non può non piacere”, aristocratico e popolare, raffinato e cafone, fa delle sue contraddizioni e delle sue divergenze il suo più grande pregio. All’AGM ci sono tutti! Gente di ogni tipo: persone diversissime tra di loro e di tutte le parti del mondo che magicamente ballano, saltano e si divertono insieme.

Il suo essere off e casalingo è diventato in breve tempo di massa, la sua irruzione nel panorama della night life romana è stata come quella di un uragano, che ha cambiato le regole del gioco, spazzando via consuetudini decennali e modificando il concetto stesso di divertimento. Per questi e mille altri motivi l’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è già mito, ma nonostante tutto rimane quello che è sempre stato: un party controcorrente e all’occasione contro anche se stesso, una festicciola tra amici nel salone di casa dove ognuno porta qualche cosa e ci si ritrova a conoscersi tutti.

L’AGM oggi piu' che mai rimane MADE AT HOME, OFF, CHEAP e OPEN rappresentando in festa l’essenza stessa del lunedì. L’AGM è un posto magico: la casa di tutti e il party di tutti nato sotto la buona stella di VEGA, custodito dai dentoni del giaguaro e abitato da sempre nuovi e strabilianti personaggi in cerca d’autore.

GoMad Events, DeepBrass Prod. & Intergalactic Music are proud to announce the debut London show, and only London date of the European Spring Tour: 
ALBOROSIE & Shengen Clan LIVE 
at Electric Brixton on April 10th, 2014,

with support from: 

MR FASO (Rootikal) 
and
BRIXTON HEIGHTS Crew. 

The genesis of Sicilian-born Alberto D’Ascola, aka Alborosie, can be blamed on an elixir of fate, talent, technologiy and most of all, determination. Born and raised in Sicily, but now residing in Kingston, Jamaica, the multi-instrumentalist Alborosie’s music career began with forming his own band Reggae National Tickets (signed to BMG Italia), at the age of 15.
 
After multiple sold-out tours, the Italian artist with a Reggae pedigree decided to make a move to Jamaica to be close to reggae music's roots and Rastafari culture and begin his solo career.

In 2011, he became the first white artist to win a MOBO (Music of Black Origin) Award in the Best Reggae Act category.

After a successful tour throughout South America and Europe in 2013; performing on re-nowned stages such as Montreux Jazz Festival, Solidays, Garorock, Dour Festival, Summerjam, Rototom, to mention a few, Alborosie and his Jamaican backing band Shengen Clan have built a huge following worldwide and have shared the stage with some of the worlds biggest international Reggae artists.

Well-known for his unbelievable energy during live shows, Alborosie starts the year at top speed and is excited to be performing in the UK for the first time. 

To date, Alborosie has worked with credible artists such as Mario, Angie Stone, Jewel, Sisqo, No Doubt, Wyclef and Les Nubians.  He has also collaborated with All-stars Dean Frazer, Beenie Man, Lutan Fya and a number of other Jamaican artists. 

Mr. FASO (Rootikal) - www.mrfaso.com

BRIXTON HEIGHTS CREW - http://www.mixcloud.com/brixtonheights3/

Supported by THTC Eco Clothing - www.thtc.co.uk

This is strictly an 18 + show.

For any more info don't hesitate to write us on:
dario@goforwardevents.co.uk
giulio@goforwardevents.co.uk

631668913553856.description:
Looking forward to sharing with each and everyone of the dance and soon to be dance community!  House Dance allows for the socialization and the language of dance to be shared between friends, adversaries, strangers, enthusiasts, and dancers of many styles.  It trains and develops both a sense of dance vocabulary, but also body kinetics and alignment, power generation, control, inflection, emotional content, and variable timing and structure.  From contemporary dancer to hard core battle gladiator, the language of house dance applies to all.  

We will fire through a host of vocabulary, applications and variations.  Then we will apply them as per various situations, tactics and strategies.  Throughout we will develop understandings as to how the dance works and why we would make various movement choices and give a path to further exploration.  

All are welcome as we look forward to helping your dance story be told... leggo.
631668913553856.name: The Tech, The Form, the (he)ART House Dance Workshop with Byron Cox in London!

AQUADANCE™ -WATER THERAPY is a soft meditative therapy in warm water to release your deepest unconscious tensions and to rejuvenate your body, mind, heart and spirit.

It helps you to relax greatly and to establish a new dimension of trust and intimacy in your relationships.

This is a perfect environment in which to dissolve fearful physical, mental or emotional tensions from as early as prenatal life. In the arms of a partner you gently get moved and almost weightlessly float into a space of deep let go.

It works to unwind and rebalance your nervous system and to open you for the magic experience of inner peace and harmony. You reconnect to your subconscious healing powers and to your origin in the ocean of life.

Working with Loving Touch and massage you receive what you have missed since the beginning of your life – a beautiful welcoming to existence. You can experience an extraordinary state of wellbeing - a state that you may have not met before.

4:45pm-7:30pm 
We'll all go out to dinner after the session. (optional)

Cost: £35 if paid on the day/£20 online booking/£15 concession

THE BARBERSHOP zu Gast zum 9jährigen LONDON CALLING Jubiläum! The Barbershop ist eine Party des Elektronischen Donnerstag-Projekts im SchwuZ! And we love this party!!!

A queer electronic ball to desymbolize and play with hair especially dedicated to transbears, cis-bears, chub women and hair fanatics of all sorts.
✄ Hair always defined gender in human history; beards and short hair as masculine, long hair and smooth faces as feminine. The biggest social and cultural revolutions appeared through new symbolizations of hair. Women were shaving their hair to refuse the power of men and men were growing hair as the feminine countercultural refusal of patriarchal societies. Last but not least growing beards happens to be the contemporary queer phenomenon to desymbolize masculine identities.

640577909317859.description:
After a whirlwind couple of year’s Gaby Moreno won the Latin Grammy for best new artist in November 2013. Born and raised in Guatemala, she started listening to blues, r&b and soul at a young age. Singers like Ella Fitzgerald, Nina Simone and Aretha Franklin inspired her to take on singing herself.

A little over 10 years ago, Gaby moved to Los Angeles, USA and after winning ”John Lennon Songwriting Contest” in 2006, she released her debut album Still The Unknown in 2008. Later that year she was asked to write the theme song for NBC’s “Parks and Recreation” (co-written with Vincent Jones), that was nominated for an Emmy Award. Latina Magazine acclaimed her ”Best New Latin Artist 2010″, and she was the support act for both Ani DiFranco’s and Tracy Chapman’s world tours in 2009 and 2010. Also in 2010, she participated in one of the most prestigious and long time rock festivals in Denmark, Roskilde, where she emotively sang in front of 17,000 people accompanied by the Youth Radio Symphony of Denmark, directed by the legendary pianist, composer, producer and Beach Boys collaborator Van Dyke Parks. The next year without any push or support from a label, her independently released second album llIustrated Songs reached #1 in sales on Latin Itunes and Amazon Latin. That led her to many concerts in the U.S. and Europe.

In 2012, Gaby Moreno entered into the Latin-American music scene, thanks to the invitation extended by her fellow countryman and one of the most successful Latin American artists of all time, Ricardo Arjona, to record the duet “Fuiste Tu”. The song won wide approval with a Latin audience as well as two Latin Grammy nominations for “Song of The Year” and “Recording Of The Year”. Subsequently Gaby released her third album Postales which retains the same swing as her previous records but is sung completely in Spanish.

In 2013, she recorded a duet with Hugh Laurie, for his new album Didn’t It Rain, a cover of the popular song “Kiss Of Fire” and Gaby has been touring the world with Hugh Laurie and the Copper Bottom Band.

“The Guatemalan songwriter Gaby Moreno plucked ragtimey syncopations on a well-worn acoustic guitar, and let loose a tangy, bluesy voice with the feistiness of Édith Piaf.”- NY Times

“Moreno’s breathtaking voice is passionate and stylistically malleable, as she glides back and forth easily between bossa nova and bluesy rock.”- NPR Tiny Desk

“Gaby Moreno’s soulful vocals and ability to switch languages and genres have made her a rising star.” – NPR All Things Considered

DJs con una seleccion de indie/electro internacional y español*  •  WAYA DJs will play a mix of International & Spanish indie/electro*

--

La noche empezará a las 22.00 hasta las 06.00, pero vamos a probar con algo distinto… habrá dos ubicaciones, un poco como en España: empezar en un bar tomando algo y luego acabar en la discoteca o empezar en la discoteca y acabar en el after... o algo así!

Primera parte (22.00 - 02.00) se presentará conjuntamente con nuestros amigos 21st Century Noise al The Macbeth Hoxton en Old Street. Allí habrá tocando un grupo en directo a demás de nuestros DJs hasta las 2am. La entrada será £5, pero de esta manera también tendréis…

…entrada gratuita a la segunda parte (01.30-06.00) de We Are Your Amigos en una ubicación secreta que se encuentra a solo 5 minutos andando, más **2 CONSUMICIONES GRATUITAS!** Tendremos nuestros propios guías que acompañarán a grupos, desde la primera fiesta hasta la otra, así no os perdéis!

Esta vez, dispondremos de un lavabo más, un guardaropa y una zona nueva con más asientos y más luces para bailar!

Puedes comprar tus entradas anticipadas aquí:
https://21stcenturynoise.ticketabc.com/events/21cnwaya040414/

APRIL 11, 2014 ELECTRIC BRIXTON, TOWN HALL PARADE, LONDON

We would like to suggest not to sleep on the tickets. This will sell out VERY VERY quickly.

GoMad Events, in collaboration with DeepBrass Production, are proud to announce another massive London showcase, at Electric Brixton.
 
Taking place on Friday 11th April 2014, the famous Berlin-based, electronic record label, BPITCH CONTROL, who helped launch the careers of popular electronic artists such as #Modeselektor, #Apparat and #PaulKalkbrenner, will showcase 5 of their most prominent artists. 
This line-up will also include the label’s founder 
Ellen Allien, who will be doing a 3-hour DJ set.

The second room will be hosted by Hdnsm with their resident djs showcase

••• BPITCH CONTROL RECORDS •••
In 1999 Ellen Allien created an island of creativity in the centre of Berlin and its turbulent techno movement. In the years that followed, Berlin became a global magnet for art and club culture, and the result of this was two-fold; the label’s artists became known well be- yond the city’s limits, and the roster absorbed more international talent.
Since the mid 2000s BPitch Control has been regarded as one of the city’s most important emblems, maintaining global friendships and relationships, organising regular showcases on several continents.


------------------------------------------

645023495569111.description:
;
:

-------------------SAVE THE LAST DANCE--------------------------


3 Jahre Tumult & Kult - Techno @   Club London Underground 

 & gleichzeitig DIE LETZTE Tumult & Kult...

außerdem feiert Freund & DJ Kollege "Wabun" der noch zur alten Schule gehört seinen Abschied und Rückzug aus dem Business um sich neuem zu widmen. 



Vor 3 Jahren ( Mitte 2011) fing alles an. Damals noch im "Club Reina" der sich auf der Rheinseite des Walzmühlcenters in Ludwigshafen befindet. Das Gebäude ist absolut Kult. Die Legendären Hallen der alten Walzmühle waren damals gefüllt mit Topp Bookings der Techno-Szene. Selbst die "Time Warp " wurde in den 90ern dort gegründet!  

http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walzm%C3%BChle 

20 Gäste hatten wir bei der 1. Veranstaltung auf dem 2.  Floor der Location :D.  "minimal" & "techhouse" bestimmten die Line Up´s sämtlicher Clubs. Mit "Tumult & Kult" sollte sich dies ändern. Die Reihe fing schnell an Anhänger zu finden.  

Im April 2012 sind wir dann wegen Schließung des "Reina" in den damals gerade wieder neu-eröffneten "Club London" gezogen.

Im Juni 2012 stieg dann bei "Tumult & Kult" mit "NIEREICH TECHNO LIVE" im London die erste richtig fette Technoparty mit Headlinerbooking... Der Laden ist eskaliert und die Region wurde mit der Leidenschaft für Techno entfacht die selbst drei Jahre später nicht ein kleines bißchen nachgelassen hat. Was ne Hammer geile Zeit <3

Mitlerweile 38 Headliner aus 9 verschiedenen Ländern <3

DANKE DAFÜR !

Am 04.04 feiern wir Bday & Abschied zugleich. Ich hoffe ihr gebt euch trotz "Time warp" Wochenende ein letztes mal die Ehre und zeigt was diesen Event ausgemacht hat. 







LINE UP

WABUN abschieds - Set // Eletrovision



EINTRITT 10€ (mit Timewarp Karte nur 5€)
OPENING 23:00
CLOSING 07:30

Flying the flag for the Dutch electronic music scene on a global scale, it’s hard to put into words just how influential Chuckie has been in his ascent. Consistently thinking outside of the box when on the decks and obsessively putting in the work when in the studio, he is firmly established as one of the biggest players. He’ll be flying over the sounds of Dirty Dutch for a very special showcase showcase at Fire-London this spring.

Crossing the boundaries between various genres, Chuckie has put his distinctive stamp in clubs and is an innovator in building an eclectic sounding dance floor.  Refusing to be categorised to just one- his distinctive blend of house and hip hop has given him an edge that puts him on a pedestal above his piers. 

Dirty Dutch has built up a reputation in all of the world’s key electronic music hubs as a trendsetter that’s revolutionised clubs worldwide. Continuously pushing the limits with its’ music and events Chuckie has rustled up a selection of DJs that will get the Arches of Fire booming.

Needing no introduction Radio 1s Danny Howard will play alongside Audio Society and Skyhigh in support. If that wasn’t enough Chuckie has called on some of the finest in established and emerging talent for room 2!  

Advanced Tickets: 15 to £25 + bf

663605787018493.description:
Following the huge success of our first conference in 2013, The Song Collectors Collective presents this one-day event of talks, presentations and performances covering the practicalities, ethics, histories and art of contemporary song collecting. A unique opportunity to explore the origins of folk song, learn about the conservation of oral culture and celebrate the gems on your doorstep and beyond!

Featuring special guest speakers and singers Reg Hall, Angela Impey, John Howson, Tony Robertson, Nan Connors, Jerry O'Reilly, Michael Sheehy, Sam Lee, James McDonald. For more info visit our website: http://songcollectorscollective.co.uk/about/events/song-collectors-conference-2014

Tickets for the whole day are £15 from http://thenestcollective.co.uk/shows/events/26-apr-14-song-collectors-collective-conference--proud-archivist

This event is part of a collaboration between the Song Collectors Collective and The Endangered Languages Archive at SOAS and is supported by Creativeworks London.

---

PLUS.. Song Collectors TRANSCRIB-ATHON 2014!

Sunday 27th April @ The Proud Archivist, Dalston 11am - 3pm. FREE

There will be free training from 11am to 11.30 on how to index and transcribe the recordings of the Song Collectors archive. The rest of the session will be a fun and social atmosphere where we collaboratively transcribe as much of the published recordings on our website as we can. If you can't make it in person, but would like to be a remote transcriber on the day, email songcollectorscollective@gmail.com with 'Transcribathon 2014' in the subject and we'll get you involved!

---

Feedback from the 2013 conference:

'As genuine and exciting as it gets. Pure British song, rare and beautiful.'

'It’s lovely to hear songs, learn of alder-cockles and see so 
many enthusiastic people.'

'A very enjoyable and interesting day. Brilliant to learn about new things and meet people from such diverse backgrounds, who all share this passion for music and stories in all their forms.'
663605787018493.name: SCC Conference 2014 @ The Proud Archivist, London

666314490076461.description:
Perhaps best known for The Pleasure Garden (1953), a film shot at Crystal Palace and awarded a prize by Jean Cocteau in Cannes, James Broughton was a man of many parts: a poet, a filmmaker, a socialite, a traveller, a husband, father, teacher and in the last third of his life, an out and radical gay man. He spent most of his creative life in San Francisco and from the late 1940s helped nurture an artistic culture that eventually gave birth to the Beats. 

Broughton's bisexual life changed forever when he began a love affair in 1975 with a young man 35 years his junior. Beautifully illustrated with extracts from his poetry and his many films, and liberally sprinkled with interviews from key collaborators, friends and family, Big Joy reveals James Broughton as a brilliantly perceptive visionary, a bold and inspiring interpreter of art and life and the joy of creation.

‘Fascinating…a revealing portrait of a man who helped to broaden our ideas of what films could accomplish.’ -  The Hollywood Reporter

‘A great documentary’- Variety

Enjoy THREE Big Joy: the Adventures of James Broughton  screenings at FLARE:
Thursday, March 27 ~ 6:10 PM	
Saturday, March 29 ~  1:00 PM
Sunday, March 30 ~  2:10 PM

Tickets go on sale 03-03-2014 11:30 AM here:
http://bit.ly/1nWgemQ
666314490076461.name: Big Joy at BFI FLARE: London LGBT Film Festival

And so to the music....

TERRACE:
SOLOMUN - Extended Set
DJ Phono + more.

GROUND FLOOR - Hosted by Familia:
Cristian Varela - Extended Set
Fabio Ferro 
Ben Grunnell 
Nick Tcherniak 
Kyle E

+ more rooms and guests TBA

Since opening our doors in 2003, we’ve played an integral part in re-establishing Kings Cross as a stomping ground for London’s discerning beat disciples. Our gnarly Flipside sound system, forward-looking lineups and industrial design aesthetics have proved popular earning us many loyal fans. During our 11 year reign we’ve become a staple of London club culture – a defining force within the scene, expanding year on year with bigger and better parties for the eyes and ears of you, the Egg London faithful.

To celebrate our birthday we’ve drafted in one of the most in demand House acts on the planet for his first London show of 2014. He's the boss of the highly regarded Diynamic Records imprint and we're stoked he will be right here for Egg London’s 11th annual celebration.  Step up SOLOMUN!  Joining the big man is Hamburg native and Diynamic label buddy DJ Phono.  Meanwhile, taking over the Familia hosted ground floor is firm Egg favourite and Techno front-runner Cristian Varela who’ll spin a 3 hour extended set.

Elsewhere, we have another present in store for you… Our birthday will also be the night we extend our highly regarded Flipside Sound System across the whole of the venue. Last year we installed the world’s first custom built Flipside rig on our Terrace floor and after Boddika called it, “literally one of the best sound systems I’ve ever played on!” and Dense & Pika said it’s “the best sound system in London, period”, we thought it perfect timing to roll it out across the rest of the club. We’re ever on a mission to make your clubbing experience the best it can possibly be and this move is testament to that.

So with all that on offer, underground clubbers of all musical persuasions should be satisfied so dust down your Oyster card and head North!
672433059479594.name: Egg London - The Birthday: Solomun, Cristian Varela, DJ Phono, Fabio Ferro +  more guests TBA

673905725984042.description:
Social Developers London is back for 2014!

Tickets for our March event are now FREE! >>> http://www.eventbrite.com/e/social-developers-london-march-2014-tickets-2929711847

For those who missed our last event or have never been, come and join us and our usual high quality speakers. 

For those who do not know us, Social Developers London (formerly known as Facebook Garage London) is a non for profit organisation established in 2009 and the pioneer of bringing the latest social technology updates for the tech and marketing communities.

OUR SPEAKERS FOR THIS MONTH :

FACEBOOK
Todd Chaffee, CEO at Blue Crow and a social media expert and Jordan Smith, Software Engineer from Betapond will give us a quick update on general Facebook platform news.

TWITTER
Angus Fox, CEO at Multizone Ltd. and a technology expert will also be bringing us up to date on the Twitter platform.

GOOGLE
We are also pleased to have, as speakers, two developer advocates from Google+, Ade Oshineye and Michael Stillwell.   Details of their talk as follows:
Title : The Flukey Bird empire: achieving fame and fortune by building on the Google Platform
Abstract:
They will explain how the developer of a hypothetical Flukey Bird game could achieve fame and fortune by building on Google's platform. They will cover Google services and APIs that can be used to enhance a social application, such as leaderboards, social sharing, easy sign-in across devices, "push" app installs, and more.

UBUNTU
We have also got Richard Collins, an Ubuntu Mobile expert from Canonical talking about the Ubuntu Phone and its SDK which just launched at Mobile World Congress. 

The talks begin at 7.00pm. Networking starts at 6.30pm.
You must buy in advance to guarantee entry on the night

Get your FREE tickets here >>> http://www.eventbrite.com/e/social-developers-london-march-2014-tickets-2929711847

See you all soon!

Social Developers London

675209602543988.description:
11/4/2014 Hotflush Recordings takeover

SOUTH LONDON ORDNANCE (UK)
LOCKED GROOVE (BE)
ahZ
Jock The Lock
Milan Kroutil
KINOCIRKUS videomapping

============================================

TERMINAL B je projekt, který přináší prostoru nákladového nádraží Žižkov zajímavou vizi hudebních nocí plných známých a přeci undergroundových Djů a producentů evropské a domácí elektronické hudební scény. Vznikl na podnět aktuálně bohužel častého jevu nechtěné invaze developerských projektů do pražských častí, kdy měl jeden takový vyrůst právě na místě Žižkovského nákladového nádraží. Našli se ale lidé, kterým tato informace nebyla jedno a pokusili se jednat s městskými zastupiteli a tento plán změnit. Přišli s ideou vytvořit v budově nádraží prostor, kterého účelem a náplní bude umění různých forem. Městská část Praha 3 schválila tento projekt na zkušební období a díky tomu bude toto místo oživeno divadlem, tancem a hudbou i prostřednictvím dramaturgie projektu Terminal B.

============================================

SOUTH LONDON ORDNANCE (UK)
 
Mladý, talentovaný producent z Londýna, který vstoupil na scénu současné elektronické hudby před dvěma lety. První věci vydává na Dub Records a postupně taky na 2nd Drop, Audio Culture anebo Hotflush Recordings. Přichází s inovativní house-tech-elektronikou a v Anglii je podporován uznávanými jmény jako je moderátorka Rádia 1 Mary Anne Hobbs anebo celosvětově známy producent Mosca. Popři produkování vlastních věcí je výborným DJem a venku je množství podcastů, například pro label Lucky Me, legendární XFM show, Rinse FM, FWD, anebo set pro Boiler Room.
 
http://soundcloud.com/south-london-ordnance
http://www.facebook.com/southlondonordnance
 
 
LOCKED GROOVE (BE)
 
je rovněž velice mladý producent tentokrát z Belgie a podobně jako SOL tvoří bass techno a hlubokou, místama až melancholickou house elektroniku se současným zvukem. Jeho produkce taky nachází domov pod labelem Hotflush Recordings, později pod Tigovým Turbo Recordings. Tyto společné jmenovatele nejsou náhodné, hosté druhého večírku pod hlavičkou Terminal B se znají a nebudou hrát na jednom pódiu poprvé. Navíc poskytnou formou workshopu své vědomosti z oblasti současné elektronické tvorby našim zájemcům.
 
http://soundcloud.com/lockedgrooves
http://www.facebook.com/lockedgroove
 
 
DJ ahZ

První ofiko hraní tohoto člena legendárního seskupení "Volnej průběh" proběhlo koncem léta 2001 v olomoucké Barumbě (RIP) a to z cdéček. Po dva roky tam pak pravidelně doplňoval pondělní večery pestrou směskou od ambientu a lounge music až po house a drumandbass. Po získání možnosti hmátnout si na vinyl definitivně odložil cdpack a přeorientoval se na desky. Od léta 2005 pak hraje pravidelně v olomouckém Metru, pro které tvořil i vizuály měsíčních programů. V současnosti žije v Praze a kromě pravidelného hraní po místních klubech spolupořádá party DrumiX, Shotgun Festival a zmiňovaný VPX. S kolegou KamCZou pravidelně již skoro čtyři roky připravuje Narovinu zlomenej podcast pro techno.cz. Seskupení "Volnej průběh", kterého je součástí a které sdružuje okrajovou hudbou zapálené blázny z Prahy (Touchwood, Stanzim, Nitrous, Rade) má také svůj pravidelný pořad na Radiu 1.
 
http://www.mixcloud.com/ahonznovak
http://www.techno.cz/nzp
 

Jock The Lock
 
Jock The Lock je sólový projekt Jaromíra Bednáře, pocházejícího z drsného kraje severní Moravy. V současné době žije již řadu let v Praze, kde nachází inspiraci a spřízněné duše. Jaromír byl odjakživa vášnivým posluchačem hudby, jako dítě a dorostenec chodil do hudební školy, kde hrál na klarinet a na kytaru. Získal tak základy rytmického a kompozičního cítění. Ve svých 20-ti letech propadl kouzlu - v té době - aktuálního drumandbassu a další elektronické hudby. Umělci jako např. Photek (Form And Function, Modus Operandi), Krust (Coded Language) a mnoho dalších, změnili jeho vnímání hudby. Ve své produkci má rád kontrasty strohosti s emočně silnou atmosférou. V současné době je inspirován aktuálním zvukem slučujícím prvky techna, garage, deep house.. a pracuje na debutové desce. Jaromír také spolupracuje s Garym Rostockem (Manchester, UK) v rámci projektu Atomise, s Josefem Sedloněm jakožto Universal Loosers a Philipem TBC pod jménem Slippery Jack
 
http://www.beatport.com/artist/jock-the-lock/107913/tracks
http://soundcloud.com/byzonek/slippery-jack-sitting-in
http://www.mixcloud.com/jaromir-bednar


Milan Kroutil
 
Pražský DJ a promotér, který miluje muziku různých žánrů a různého tempa, co je znatelné i v jeho vlastních setech, rád hraje pro publikum, které dokáže vnímat a dovolí mu být eklektickým. Jeho sety nejsou jenom náhodně vybrané věci, tracky si dopředu selektuje a má k nim vymyšlený příběh. Neustále sleduje nové věci, které rád hraje a zažívá přitom energii a překvapení společně s posluchači. Není vybíravý, ale nehraje často, protože se dle jeho slov chce na hraní těšit a ne 'jít do práce'. South London Ordnance je pro něj splněným snem, protože je v současnosti spolu s Bodikou jeden z jeho nejoblíbenějších producentů. Milan Kroutil vlastním jménem Marek Olchava je spoluzakladatelem Terminalu B stejně jako letního pražského večírku La Bella Vida.


KINOCIRKUS videomapping

KinocirKus je otevřený a nezávislý kolektiv sídlící v Praze. Spojuje nás vášeň k živým audiovizuálním vystoupením, interaktivním instalacím a experimentům s novými médiemi a technologiemi. Naším cílem je vytvářet inovativní prostory kde dochází k propojení lidí a jejich interakci s okolím. 
KinocirKus je eklektická mezinárodní směs VJů, vizuálních umělců, sochařů, animátorů, filmařů, programátorů a fotografů. Naše projekty kombinují architektonický mapping, video mapping, interaktivní instalace, VJing a živá audiovizuální vystoupení.

http://www.facebook.com/kino.cirkus.page


============================================


SOUTH LONDON ORDNANCE (UK)

Based in London, this young and talented guy has entered the local electronic music sceen two years ago. His first releases came out on Dub Records and afterwards his music is spread by 2nd Drop, Audio Culture and Hotflush Recordings. He comes with an inovative tech-house-electronica and in UK he has been supported by legendary names like Mary Anne Hobbs from Radio 1 or Mosca. In addition to his music, he is a brilliant DJ as well and there are lot of different podcast for example for Lucky Me, legendární XFM show, Rinse FM, FWD, or his set for Boiler Room.
 
http://soundcloud.com/south-london-ordnance
http://www.facebook.com/southlondonordnance

LOCKED GROOVE (BE)

He is also a very young producer from Belgium and he admires similar stuff as SOL - deep bass techno eventually melancholic house electronica with contemporary sound. His production finds its home at Hotflush Recordings and Tigo's Turbo Recordings. These connections between our guests are not random, they are friends and played together many times before. Moreover we are offering a workshop with both of them.
 
http://soundcloud.com/lockedgrooves
http://www.facebook.com/lockedgroove


Jock The Lock

Jock the Lock is a name of a solo project of Jaromír Bednář, who comes from rough part of the North Moravia. Nowadays he lives in Prague and he has found there an inspiration and soul mates. He has been loving music since ever and as he boy he went to music school where he played clarinet and guitar. As a teenager he was charmed by drum'n'bass and other electronic music. One of his big influences is Photek (Form And Function, Modus Operandi) or Krust (Coded Language). In his own production he uses contrast of curtness and strongly emotional atmosphere. Lately he has been influenced by contemporary sound that connects fragments of techno, garage, or deep house and he's preparing his album. Jaromir also cooperates with Gary Rostock (UK) on project called Atomise, with Josef Sedloň as Universal loosers and with Philip TBC under the name Slippery Jack.  
 
http://www.beatport.com/artist/jock-the-lock/107913/tracks
https://soundcloud.com/byzonek/slippery-jack-sitting-in
http://www.mixcloud.com/jaromir-bednar


Milan Kroutil (CZ)

is a DJ and promoter from Prague who loves music of many kinds and rates and you can feel it when you see him playing live. He appreciates an audience that is empathetic and makes him to be eclectic. His sets are not only random tracks but he selects them very carefully and creates a story out of them. He's checking out for a new stuff constantly, and than he shares the moment of an excitement right there with his audience. He doesn't play regularly because he really wants to enjoy it and not to feel like it's a job. South London Ordnance is his dream came true because he is one on his favorites together with Bodika. Marek Olchava aka Milan Kroutil is a cofounder of Terminal B project as well as summertime event La Bella Vida.

KINOCIRKUS 

Kinocirkus is an open and indipendent collective based in Prague, that grew in love for live A/V performances, interactive installations, and experimenting with new media and technologies. Members include an eclectic, international mix of VJs, video artists, sculptors, animators, filmmakers, programmers, and photographers. 
Our aim is to construct innovative spaces where people can connect and participate with their surroundings. Our projects combine architectural mapping, video mapping, interactive installation, VJing and live audio/visual performance.

http://www.facebook.com/kino.cirkus.page

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
http://www.viceaudio.com
http://www.facebook.com/viceaudio.rentalprague

679129415484274.description:
Last year saw us team up with one of Londons hottest brands and one of the most sought after labels around at the moment, Fuse, on more than one occasion. As you'll remember we brought Seb Zito, Ittetsu, Chris Lattner and East End Dubs to Leeds for the first time, sharing the decks with them over the course of several events. 

This time around we're welcoming one of the most popular within their ranks; ROSSKO

Affiliated with his UK roots Rossko has always kept his sound original & forward thinking with love of blending the past with forgotten vintage gems. Connecting the dots and blurring the lines is what he does foremost.
A long standing resident of Cerca Trova & Fuse in London, whether he's on the bill of the clandestine quarterly basement party sessions or spinning one of those infamous fuzzy Sunday afternoons, his minimal-tinged shades of House and Techno are loved universally. Operating more so as a DJ, than a producer, a rarity in the current climate, the last 12 months saw him hold a regular slots at the now infamous Sankeys Ibiza, where him and his posse did the damage all Summer long and we can't wait to welcome him to our yard. 

Support, as ever, comes from a selection of BeatStreet residents;

Kezla | Will Crawshaw | Thomas Olivier | Hopkinson | Niko Maxen| Will Matiu

682654038432128.description:
ONLY UK SHOW -  the show will be hosted by Steve Tefis (IBP) & Seven Churches, with us helping promote the show. support from GRAVE MIASMA and CATTLE DECAPITATION

Few bands have done more to push the boundaries of extreme metal than the legendary Possessed. Even fewer can create a unique style which continues to set them apart from all others in a genre they laid the foundation for. 

Mike Torrao (guitar), Mike Sus (drums) and Barry Fisk (vocals) got their start playing covers of bands like Judas Priest and Iron Maiden. After Fisk’s unfortunate suicide, Torrao and Sus recruited singer/bassist Jeff Becerra from local metal band Blizzard to form a new band - Possessed - whose name would eventually be known by heavy music fanatics worldwide. 

Possessed took San Francisco’s metal scene by storm, playing with fellow Bay Area thrashers and friends Exodus, and other bands- many now long gone. In 1982-1983, they recorded a four song demo. One of the demo tracks, “Swing of the Axe” ended up on the Metal Massacre 6 compilation and later on “The Best of Metal Massacre.” 

While starting to make waves in the metal community, Possessed replaced guitarist Brian Montana, whose dedication to the band had waned. To fill the void left by Montana, Jeff Becerra recruited friend and Blizzard band mate Larry LaLonde. LaLonde’s passion for guitar and home-grown style fit Possessed perfectly; roughly six months after LaLonde joined Possessed, they signed to Combat Records. 

Released in October 1985 on Combat Records, Seven Churches set a new standard for extreme music. Combining Torraro and LaLonde’s lighting fast riffs, Becerra’s raspy trademark growl and speedy bass playing, Sus’s pummeling drums and Randy Burns’ production, Seven Churches created a whole new genre of music- death metal. Written by primarily by Torrao and Becerra, Seven Churches went on to be one of Combat Records’ best-selling albums. Not bad for a quartet of high school kids! 

Torrao and Becerra teamed up with LaLonde to write Beyond the Gates. Released on Halloween in 1986, this album was especially well-received in Europe where they toured at the end of the year. The album that changed the landscape of heavy metal, Seven Churches is the bar by which death metal albums are still measured. 

After that tour, Possessed recorded and released Eyes of Horror, a five song EP produced by Joe Satriani. Musically and lyrically advanced, the album touched on dark themes such as sin, drugs and violence. Not long after the release of the EP, LaLonde joined up with Les Claypool and Primus. Soon after, Sus left to continue his studies at SFSU and Torrao decided he no longer wanted to play in a band. Becerra continued to play and joined some side projects, but mostly took time to pursue his goals in life. At one point, Torrao attempted to re-create Possessed, but this attempt was short lived. 

In 2004, Becerra joined with Sadistic Intent to record “The Exorcist” for a Possessed tribute album. Becerra and Sadistic Intent decided to do a few live shows to satisfy fans who had been clamoring for shows for decades. With such a positive response, Becerra and Sadistic Intent continued to play a number of successful shows, including Wacken 2007, Maryland Deathfest 2009, and 2010’s Blackest of the Black Tour. This lineup breathed life into Sadistic Intent and Becerra, and the two parties split amicably to play their own styles of metal, with drummer Emilio Marquez staying with Becerra and Possessed. 

In 2011, Becerra and Marquez (Asesino, Coffin Texts, ex-Brujeria) found new blood in bassist Robert Cardenas (Masters Of Metal (formally know as Agent Steel), Malice, Coffin Texts, Engrave), along with guitarists Kelly McLauchlin (Pessimist, Diabolic, Unholy Ghost) and Daniel Gonzalez (Nailshitter). 

After making several live appearances, including Graspop 2012 & The Fallen Angel 2012 European Tour, this lineup has established Possessed for a new era. The Possessed legacy has been highly influential in the realm of extreme metal, changing the genre forever. Ready to take it further, Possessed is planning several tour dates and writing new material that will change the face of death metal once more.

Tickets £20 Adv.

https://www.stargreen.com/a-z/possessed.html
http://www.ticketweb.co.uk/event/possessed-tickets/99319
